name: Chromatic Isle
description: Discover the peaceful beauty of Chromatic Isle, a 30-minute getaway where music and puzzles unite in the four seasons. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to puzzles, this harmonious journey awaits. Unveil the secrets of each season in Chromatic Isle.

name: Crystal Corruption: Reclamation
description: Dive into a fast-paced, stylish action roguelike metroidvania as resurrected King Cedric. Hack and slash through diverse biomes, face corrupted minibosses, and conquer epic foes. Uncover shattered truths and choose your path to redemption in this gripping tale of vengeance and power.

name: Applied Energistics 2
description: Applied Energistics 2 (AE2) is a comprehensive mod for Minecraft that introduces a unique approach to in-game inventory management. It presents a tech-based, futuristic theme, centered around the concept of using energy and technology to convert matter into energy and vice versa.

name: The Dire
description: Dean Holt, popular Urbex vlogger, sets off on another exploration of an abandoned home but this time things aren't going as planned. Something dark is lurking inside and Dean quickly finds himself in over his head

name: Debug Girl
description: Spend a summer with an old high school classmate making games! Play and debug a 2D action RPG to make the best game ever.

name: Dungeon Minesweeper
description: Dungeon Minesweeper is a unique roguelike based on a minesweeper! Explore the dungeon, bypass the bombs, defeat the boss and get out of the dungeon!

name: Deviator
description: 'Deviator' is a Metroidvania game centered around parry, featuring exquisite 2D hand-drawn visuals. explore unknown wilderness and mysterious cities, delving into enigmatic realms of consciousness and encountering peculiar creatures. uncover the truth behind this chaotic world.

name: Dungeons Deep
description: Plunge into the Dungeons Deep! A dark-fantasy ARPG featuring vast underworlds full of horrifying monsters and ancient treasures. Liberate the old lands of Antioch for those who still remain.

name: Dog And Goblin
description: A fantasy deck-building strategy game. Your items and minions have transformed into card symbols. They interact with each others and automaticly fight to beat human army. Choose your cards, build a strong army and destroy human's fort!

name: Bug Bots
description: A puzzle game featuring bug robots where the objective is to get to the end portal of the level.

name: Armored Tussle
description: Armored Tussle is a roguelike twin-stick shooter where you control the elite tomcat battle tank pilots through a series of procedurally generated missions behind enemy lines, completing objectives, collecting upgrades and defeating any enemies that stand in your way.

name: Big Shots
description: Gear up, team up, and exterminate! Become the ultimate mech pilot in BIG SHOTSⓇ, the action-packed VR roguelite where you’ll battle alien hordes, earn upgrades, and forge an unstoppable mech to reclaim Earth.

name: Drop the Dice
description: Drop the Dice is a “Side Game” whose goal is to score as many points as possible by placing your dice on the board! Optimize the positioning to obtain similar totals on your rows and columns, increase your score, use bonuses and cross the different levels!

name: Darkest Dungeon II: The Binding Blade
description: A fearless fencer, a lost knight. One waits at the crossroads for redemption, the other, adrift in the sprawling wilds of the Kingdom. Master the ruthless Duelist, battle through barricades, and seek clues that will lead you to...the last of the Crusaders. This DLC adds 2 new heroes, The Duelist and The Crusader, with their own unique trinkets, signature items, and fully voiced backstories including playable flashback encounters. It also adds a new roaming mini-boss, The Warlord.

name: 100F Blessing of the Guardian
description: “Climb 100 floors and save humans oppressed by evil spirits!” Experience a realistic VR game!

name: Desk of Desires: VR Office Sex
description: Step into a world where office fantasies and erotic desires come to life with "Desk of Desires: VR Office Sex." This immersive adult VR game takes you on an electrifying journey into the secret world of professional passion.

name: Dampf: The Cozy Tower Defense
description: Cozy tower defense meets stylistic futuristic steampunk. Manage resources, buildings & towers. Unlock perks to further specialize yourself. Plan your defense & survive all enemy waves.

name: Cyberdelic
description: Cyberdelic is an immersive FPS - Use a combination of weaponry to pierce your hostiles shields, armour and flesh. Swap out cybernetic components to best suit your combat encounters. Explore an interconnected environment acquiring additional tools to your arsenal.

name: Cats and Seek: Extra Level
description: 100 more cats for you to find!

name: Chambers: The Outlaw
description: Step into the Weird Wild West of Chambers: The Outlaw, a thrilling first-person hellyeah-em-up! Explore the open world, conquer vast lands, engage in epic duels, and trade in bustling cities in this action-packed adventure! Chambers: The Outlaw is a prologue ver. of the game Chambers.

name: All I Want for Christmas Are Subgames
description: A Sleigh-full of Subgames for the Holidays!

name: AstroPanic
description: AstroPanic is a top-down rogue-like 2D space game. Upgrade your ship by battling aliens, progress to new levels with the points you earn, and get ready for an exciting space adventure!

name: Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name - Legendary Fighter Pack
description: Enter the Coliseum and play as or alongside legendary yakuza: Goro Majima Taiga Saejima Daigo Dojima *Requires Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name (sold separately)

name: RealFlight Evolution: Cirrus Vision SF50
description: The Cirrus Aircraft Vision Jet is the culmination of relentless innovation. As the world's first single-engine Personal Jet, it excels in performance while being simple to fly and easy to own and operate.

name: RealFlight Evolution: Triple Tree 3D Flight Line
description: This is the 3D flying site/flight line at Triple Tree Aerodrome that accommodates even the largest giant-scale aerobatic models flown to their limits by many of the world's top pilots.

name: Yttr
description: A mod about the Void, what has gone before, and where you'll go from here. A vanilla overhaul crossed with a content mod.

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite EC-1500 Twin 1.5m
description: The E-flite EC-1500 Twin is a groundbreaking aircraft that offers a unique flight experience for a wide range of pilots! This multi-motor model carries echoes of full-scale civil and military cargo transport aircraft but has an incredible range of capabilities and options no other airplane matches.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KFLL Airport
description: (IATA: FLL, ICAO: KFLL, FAA LID: FLL) is a major public airport in Florida, United States. It is one of three airports serving the Miami metropolitan area, with over 700 daily flights to 135 domestic and international destinations.

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite Carbon-Z Cub SS 2.1m
description: The E-flite Carbon-Z Cub SS 2.1m makes it easier than ever to enjoy a truly unique and versatile giant-scale flying experience. Based on the original Carbon-Z Cub, it's equipped with an abundance of new convenience, capability and flight performance-improving features.

name: Hangman
description: Hangman is a playable version of hangman that is bundled into the Speller 6-in-1 Spellchecker. The handheld features 2 versions of the game, one against a CPU and the other with local multiplayer.

name: Anagram
description: Anagram is a puzzle game that is bundled into the Speller 6-in-1 Spellchecker. The handheld features 2 versions of the game, one against a CPU and the other with local multiplayer.

name: Auction
description: Auction is a game bundled into the Speller 6-in-1 Spellchecker. The game has you guess the item that is on sale, every wrong guess you lose money and you gain money by guessing it right. The handheld features 2 variations of the game, 1 against a computer and the other being local multiplayer.

name: Arriving Early
description: Arriving Early is a sequel / spinoff of the Running Late series. Includes 15 levels of high octane, heart pounding action.

name: The Valley of Calm Trees
description: The Valley of Calm Trees is a fairly short limit-removing single map for Doom 2, set in a relaxing forested

name: Angry Neighbor in Town
description: You're neighbor is suspicious! find out what he is doing

name: Super Mario World: The Second Reality Project 2 - Zycloboo's Challenge
description: Sequel to the first rom hack, The Second Reality Project, this new story brings a totally new villain to the franchise, Zycloboo (who is a Big Boo with one eye).

name: LBreakoutHD
description: LBreakoutHD is a breakout clone written by Michael Speck and is a remake of LBreakout2 with improved graphics. The gameplay of LBreakout2 is (mostly) preserved and it includes all levels from LBreakout2.

name: KGoldrunner
description: KGoldrunner is an action game where the hero runs through a maze, climbs stairs, dig holes and dodges enemies in order to collect all the gold nuggets and escape to the next level. Your enemies are also after the gold. Worse still, they are after you!.

name: The Silent Neighbor
description: In the neighborhood you step into, everyone has their secrets... But only your silent neighbor's is deadly. "The Silent Neighbor" is an immersive horror game that combines mystery and suspense. In the depths of a house filled with hidden passages, puzzles, and unexpected perils, you will uncover the dark secrets of your neighbor and strive to stay alive. Solve mind-bending puzzles, navigate through terrifying moments, and dare to confront the cursed past of your silent neighbor. Silence can be deceiving. It is time to face a silent threat in the darkness.

name: Oratorio
description:
Oratorio is a rhythm action rail-shooter developed for the 8-bit Nintendo Entertainment System.

Primarily inspired by games like Rez, Child of Eden, and Thumper. Oratorio is a unique on-rails rhythmic shooter where players create the music of the game through interaction with the game's systems, like shooting enemies, projectiles, and powerups. Everything players do contributes to the soundscape in this innovative retro music shooting game.

The game takes place in a dystopian cyberpunk future where an environmentalist hacker group launches a desperate mission to hack the servers of one of the world's largest corporations in order to steal the DNA sequences for extinct plants and animals that the corporation has copyrighted for use in virtual reality safaris. As the enigmatic hacker named Oratorio, players are the last hope for revival in a world that has gone to a digital ruin.

Players control a cursor and assume a first-person perspective on an ever-expanding digital track in cyberspace.

name: Hollywood Animal
description: Make your dreams come true — or crush someone else’s. Take the helm of a major Hollywood studio at the dawn of sound cinema, and guide it through decades of creative achievements and glamor, debauchery and dark deeds, tough choices and unpleasant compromises.

name: Dinky Kong
description: A demake of Donkey Kong in PICO-8 starring Minio and Dinky Kong.

name: Refined Storage
description: Refined Storage is a mass storage mod for Minecraft that offers the player a network-based storage system, allowing them to store items and fluids on a massively expandable device network.

name: Heads Up! Phones Down Edition
description:
Showcase your wit (or lack thereof) in this hilarious party game, fit for the big screen!

Heads Up is a Party Game
Turn your back to the TV, and guess the word or phrase on the screen behind you with the help of your friends or family.

That Invites Everyone to Play
It doesn’t matter if you’re an expert or you’ve never played before—anyone can jump right in.

And Be Silly
Observers can give hints by using fUnNy AcCeNts, acting out, and SHOUTING clues while the guesser tries to figure out the word on the screen. OR break down in desperation when you can’t figure it out.

name: Picopolis
description:
Picopolis is a SimCity demake / idle game in which you place roads, residental/industrial/commercial zoning, schools, police departments, hospitals, and various other things.

The city will grow depending on housing, jobs, pollution, and crime ratings, and the bigger it gets the more money you make.

name: Dragon Quest +
description:
All is darkness. The Dragon Lord has captured the Princess and stolen The Legendary Hero's Ball of Light!
You are the Legendary Hero's heir. You have been assigned a most dangerous task: to rescue the King's daughter and retrieve the Ball of Light.
The journey ahead will be tough, but it is your destiny. Three Sages await your arrival, each willing to reward you with mystical items of great power
Gather these three items, let your wits be about you as you gain experience, weapons and armor as you battle your way through Alefgard. Rest if you must!
Search out the Dragon Lord's lair and face your destiny, in the role playing epic, Dragon Quest.

name: Size Experiments at Morinomma Tech
description: As a worker at Morinomma Tech with some experiment happy uppers, it's on you to assist them with their experiments, and even test them out. First you need to find them around the building. Three bottles to find and use on you or your other scientists leading the experiments, maybe something else to do when you find all three.

name: Little Runmo
description: The Game, is a 2D platformer game originating from an animated Youtube film called "Little Runmo" made by the creator Gooseworx. The Story revolves around a fictional videogame character trying to survive with his last life.

name: Mostly Harmless
description: Assume the role of Nanashi, who winds up journeying to the Core of a forsaken Earth with Cotard, its humorous and totally legitimate Janitor. Talk about architecture! Snoop emails with nuclear information! Prevent emotional crises!

name: Space Rangers: Legacy
description: Destroy the cybernetic fleet and save the Universe! Set on an adventure in the world of the breath-taking cosmic saga. Help the Coalition to oppose the intransigent enemy — cybernetic Dominators, who aim to conquer all galaxy — one star system after another. You'll need to stop Dominators by destroying their key nerve centers. Make alliances with the sapient races, accomplish versatile missions, defeat space pirates and be victorious!

name: SummonerRL
description: As a Summoner, it's your sacred duty to uproot the spreading corruption from the depths of the dungeon and release its grasp on the natural world. Your only companions on this journey will be the animals conjured by your own power. Find a ritual focus and use it to bring a benevolent familiar to your side. Together you must overcome the twisted beings that stand in your way.

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Deluxe Edition
description:
With the Deluxe Edition, get access to the base game and the Fitted Ultimate Pack, including:
- Porsche 718 Spyder 2021 Fitted Edition.
- Honda Civic Type R 2021 Fitted Edition.
- Customization items.

Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate driving experience! Explore the vibrant open world of O‘ahu in Hawaii as you compete in intense races, themed events, and much more!

name: Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name - Deluxe Edition
description:
Once a legendary yakuza, Kazuma Kiryu faked his own death and abandoned his name for the sake of protecting his family. Now, he is thrust into conflict by a mysterious figure attempting to drive him out of hiding.

DELUXE EDITION INCLUDES:
-Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name
-Legendary Fighter Pack

name: Arcade Archives: Shao-Lin's Road
description:
"SHAO-LIN'S ROAD" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1985.
Take control of WANPYOU, a student of Chin-Style Shao-Lin martial arts who is being held captive in Jaken Temple, the base of the evil YAMUCHA Gang who assassinated WANPYOU's master, RAOCHUU.
Use your lightning-fast kicks to fight your way to freedom and victory!

name: Spookynakki
description:
Clear level after level of monsters, using the very blocks you stand on as your only weapon. Can you defeat every foe without falling through the shrinking foundation?

Spookynakki is the bone-chilling continuation of Grabanakki, featuring 3 new worlds, a variety of new and returning mechanics, and a completely new OST.

name: Doomsday Lonely town
description: 《Doomsday Lonely town》is an idle tower defense game. In the doomsday world, you can form your team to resist the attacks of monsters and protect the isolated town behind you.

name: Cluckmech Oasis
description: "Cluckmech Oasis" is a tower defense Roguelike with top-down shooting, players will play the battle chicken and its partners, in the journey to collect a variety of strange defensive machinery, a large number of plant enemies, along the way to escort base vehicles to save the world!

name: WooLoop: Nature Pack
description: This Nature-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Explore Autumn with these images of the outdoors! Create images of the natural world in all its beauty.

name: Wood Guy
description: Defy the laws of physics with the wooden puppet and journey through this 2D platformer in a 3D world of handicrafts! Play alone or with friends .... or against friends!

name: Where Cats?
description: Look for 100 cats. Delicately hand drawn scenes, lovely animal characters. Short process, which will not take up too much player time. No punishment, relaxed and happy. You can play with your family and friends on the same computer. It is suitable for all ages.

name: Where Christmas Elves?
description: Search for 100 Christmas elves. A carefully hand-painted scene. Short process, relaxed and enjoyable. You can choose the selected color you like, making it convenient for players who are color blind or weak. You can achieve all your accomplishments without purchasing DLC.

name: Weapon Shop Decillionaire
description: Weapon Shop Decillionaire is an idle game where weapons turn your dreams of wealth into reality. Build and sell equipment, use the profit to enhance it, while mastering strategic weapon placement on your shop's grid. It's time to become a decillionaire, one sword at a time!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Drukhari
description: The Drukhari are an ancient race that fell into degeneracy and depravity, with their remnants only surviving in immense Webway cities.

name: Wallkill
description: Need ammo, weapons, or modifiers? Only in this world, come to room 74! But there’s a small problem - we are in a maze... By the way, did the rooms have numbers?

name: VR Fitness: R18 DLC
description: Easy fitness in VR! Complete missions and hidden elements! Sexual exercise with a girl instructor!

name: The Last World
description: After the world ends, the remaining survivors must defend the last spark of human civilization. Use the camp as a position to repel the waves of monsters in each city! Thay are too powerful? It doesn't matter! Get stronger equipment, learn stronger skills, and finally sweep thousands of armies!

name: The Castle
description: Title: Hidden Castle This is a first-person perspective exploration horror game where you aim to escape from a mysterious castle you stumbled upon while seeking shelter from the rain.

name: The Mouse The Merrier
description: The Mouse the Merrier is a cozy puzzle game about reuniting a mouse with his lost family. Traverse through a beautiful flooded landscape, sliding along floating petals and hopping onto buttons. Help Mousimus find his family and try your best not to leave anymouse behind!

name: The Legend of Yan Loong 1+2
description: A nostalgic collections of the chapter 1 and 2 of “Yan Loong Legend” series. Pick up your sword again, transform into Yan Loong, Zhi Loong or Shui Yan with your friends to have a battle of light and darkness with the final boss Bai Loong and regain the occupied Green Hill Lake.

name: The Launching Section
description: An arcade game where you launch projectiles at fruits, because why not

name: The Crevice
description: Explore, adapt, and survive. Climb deep inside The Crevice and unearth the mysteries, horrors and treasures buried within in this subterranean roguelite survival adventure.

name: Symbio
description: Immerse yourself in a microscopic world teeming with life and multitudes of organisms and species trying to survive in the harsh environment of prehistoric Earth. Eat, breed and poop (yes, that too). And evolve from a single cell to a complex multicellular organism.

name: The Brave Little Cloud
description: In the game "The Brave Little Cloud", you will become the main character - a little cloud that fights against evil to protect its world.

name: Splat Arena
description: Splat Arena is a over the top violent top down shooter inspired by the madness combat series.

name: Spinshot Party
description: Join the excitement of a real-life table football game! This game is easy to learn, but challenging to master, making it perfect for players of all skill levels. It's a family-friendly game that's sure to liven up any party.

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Black Swordsman Swords Skins Set
description: Obtain 5 Sword Weapon Skins for 1-handed sword type weapons in-game.

name: ShadowStorm
description: Discover a chaotic future where the intensity of battles reaches unparalleled heights. Get ready for action and join the battlefield (up to 16 players in multiplayer) or take on bots in solo mode. ShadowStorm: strategy and boldness will lead you to victory!

name: SGS Battle For: Madrid
description: With Battle for Madrid, relive the Nationalists most determined attempt to take the Republican capital of spain from November 1936 to February 1937.

name: Sexy Strippers
description: Sexy Strippers - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Riders of the Wild
description: An open-world indoor biking game

name: RGBounce
description: A Challenging and fast-paced 3D platformer where you have to navigate through the levels by matching your color with the color of the platform

name: Rebel Duet
description: Rebel Duet is a story-driven adult visual novel, where you are summoned to become the partner of a beautiful young succubus. Sexually train your demonic companion, and evolve from a humble office worker into a powerful spellsword. How much of your humanity are you willing to trade for power?

name: Plunder Ball
description: Blast the zombie pirate horde away! Protect your treasure and fight for the high-score in this pinball-inspired shooting gallery.

name: Pight
description: Pight is a minimalist puzzle game inspired by the Minecraft redstone system, in which we try to turn on the light block by using piston blocks and different block types.

name: Party Party Time: Thrilling Party Pack
description: I can't contain my excitement! Enjoy 10 new minigames!

name: Melody
description: Melody is a music themed game where you play a session musician, tasked with the job of teaching an aspiring singer-songwriter (named Melody). This VN is filled with plenty of drama, humour, romance, sex, and of course, music! Can you help Melody to share her songs and unique voice with the world?

name: Mecha Nun-chuck Redeemer
description: Wield this Mighty Holy Weapon to Smite waves of mecha-demons ! Fill the Special Attack Gauge to launch a Devastating Holy Hand Grenade Attack! This Awesome Divine Power is Yours for a small donation of course.

name: Lost Infinity
description: Where are you going with the main character? "Lost Infinity" is a game about nothing, or maybe something, only you will decide. Grieve, think, reason.

name: Krosfighter
description: Who will be the last one standing? Choose your hero from a wide range of universes and play with friends in this party shooter packed with colorful graphics and rogue-like features. It's just plain fun, online or locally, for two to four players.

name: Koco
description: Get ready for Koco, a 3D jumping game where you become a little chef on a big adventure! In Koco, you'll jump around gigantic food and tackle various challenges. These oversized dishes will do their best to stop you, so keep an eye on the clock and make it to the finish line!

name: Milo
description: Survive an onslaught of cult adherents that worship a mysterious beverage

name: Motionrec
description:
Motionrec is an action game that progresses through stages by recording and replaying the trajectory of your movements. Using Motionrec, you aim to clear stages quickly by recording and replaying your unique motions.

Motionrec is a gear that allows you to record, replay, and reverse-play your own movements. Customize it to your original specifications and strive for the fastest performance.

name: Multiplayer Bots
description: Bad bots are attacking Tronix city, it is up to you and your team of droids to stop them!

name: Ord-Upp
description: Ord-upp is a puzzle game where the purpose is to create words from fallings letters. There is also an alternative mode where numbers and operators must be combined in a way to meet a target number.

name: Nightmare Trek: The Next Level Challenge
description: Don't let its minimalist look fool you: this is the most challenging game you have ever played! Can you dodge hordes of lunging spikes, itching to impale you at every turn? Only one way to find out! Buy now!

name: Harve
description: Harve" - Cultivate Life. Thrive. Nurture your digital ecosystem in this captivating, community-driven idle game.

name: Ground Parkour: First Mission
description: Ground parkour: First Mission, in short, you compete with yourself to reach the highest point on the track with different characters and different abilities in a construction site in the city. Each character has different abilities and you progress on this track full of obstacles. Enjoy!

name: Hangry Bear
description: Bear your hunger and prepare for a paw-some time! Hangry Bear's arcade adventure lets you dash, flip, and dropkick your way through a hilarious frenzy. Can you keep your cool while your bear belly rumbles, racing against the clock to satisfy your fishy desires and secure bear-brilliant high scores?

name: Hentai Milena
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Hearth & Holmes
description: A mystery-solving life sim where John Watson tries to get his flatmate to eat something and go to sleep.

name: Hockey Legacy Manager 24
description: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional hockey team!

name: Hidden World 9 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden World 7 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Journey's Land
description: Journey's Land is an upcoming Action RPG game in which the player will have to save a land from an underworld force that has come back to life.

name: Jewel Match Solitaire Winterscapes 2: Collector's Edition
description: Escape to a picturesque winter wonderland with enchanting backgrounds that change as you build fantasy locations throughout the game. Don't miss out on the most delightful Solitaire experience of the year. Let the snowflakes guide your cards to victory!

name: Isopod: A Webbed Spin-off
description: You're a tiny pill-bug in a big world! From the creators of Webbed. Roll, zip, and slam your way through the gorgeous landscapes of the Australian bush, unite your fellow bugs, and fight back the greedy Fire Ant Conglomerate!

name: Isonzo: Second Wave
description: The ‘Glacial Units' pack contains a set of improvised winter uniforms for Italy and Austria-Hungary. It contains a set of uniforms for all classes, plus headgear and facial items.

name: Ethereal Enigma
description: Are you ready to take ghostbusting into your own hands? Find the elements to complete the ritual, and escape the room.

name: Globalism
description: A global strategy for the 21st century. The threat of nuclear war, economic inequality, overpopulation of some regions and extinction of other regions, the crisis of capitalism... Find your solutions to the current problems of mankind!

name: Ghosts of Oblivion
description: A strategy game in which you need to create a deck of cards and defend against waves of opponents using different tactics by combining them. Armies of evil spirits have attacked our world and you have to fight back the hordes of monsters!

name: Forged Isles
description: "Forged Isles" offers a breathtaking 3D medieval experience in the sky. Mine resources, conquer dungeons, and shape your own tale amidst floating islands. Unleash your inner adventurer and defy gravity today!

name: First Blood
description: "First Blood" bağımsız bir optimizayon mekanizması kullanır. Oyunda, Klasik Mücadele, Eğleneli Mücadele ve Macera modları vardır. Harika silahlar, sürükleyici atış deneyimi ve heyecan verici savaşlar, oyuncuların silahlarla savaşma eğlencesinin tadını çıkarması için tasarlandı.

name: End of Back World
description: End of Back World is a Bishojo TPS action game based on the SCP worldview. You must kill mutants in the backroom and cleanse the city. Survive through combat training and weapon modification with items obtained from the back room.

name: Dreamworld Dread
description: Your nightmares relentlessly return every time you close your eyes. Learn new skills, level them up, and never lose them, or else succumb to the darkness in this thrilling roguelite deckbuilder.

name: Dice Captain
description: Dice Captain is a thrilling roguelike adventure that invites you to command your own ship and crew. Explore a randomly generated maps, select unique sailors with upgradeable dice, and master the art of tactic with talismans and one-time-use cards. Are you ready to become the ultimate Dice Captain?

name: Dee's Nuts 2
description: Dee is back, in an all new game of grabbing Dee's nuts. Fill your tree to the brim with nuts before the winter season. This time you can race your friends in an all new single player, up to 3 person multiplayer experience and battle to collect the most nuts.

name: Cufflinks & Cages
description: You've been locked in Chastity by your cruel boss, will you submit to her sadistic whims, or let the company find our your secret in this Futa-on-futa chastity focused Visual Novel!

name: Cosmic Blastards
description: Battle time and terror in this shoot & survive action roguelite. Select your hero and survive the relentless cosmic surge. Shoot, level up, topple bosses, and amplify your powers to cosmic levels. Embrace the Blastard within and unlock new heroes, powers, and perks to use on future runs.

name: Cloud Castle
description: 《Cloud Castle》It is a strategic tower defense game that builds your defense route by placing and upgrading on a grid map, resisting waves of monsters.

name: BvB: Burglars vs. Brats
description: Burglars vs Brats is a team-based online multiplayer game where players compete as both The Burglars and The Brats in a game of Attack and Defend. Inspired by classic films such as Home Alone, The Goonies, Kevin the Menace, and more! BvB is full of laugh-out-loud moments and charismatic characters!

name: Big Ball Sports
description: Experience sports in a whole new dimension with Big Ball Sports!

name: Biomeinoes
description: Biomeinoes is a score-attack tile-matching strategy game about building abstract isometric landscapes. Optimise your resources, plan ahead, and fine-tune your strategy to climb the ranks!

name: Bravest Chicken
description: Minimalist precision platformer starring a cute chicken. Flap your wings, avoid obstacles, get to the top of the tower and become Bravest Chicken!

name: Battle Alchemy: Autobattler
description: Forge your own weapon and master alchemy, Battle other players to see who is the best!

name: Bat Blast!
description: Bat Blast! is a 2D game about magical bats. Take control of one of many magical fruit bats, and blast your way upwards through the minions of 'The Master' as you strive to escape his tower.

name: Banana Co.
description: Banana Co. is a first person horror game in which you're placed into a terrifying banana factory where you have to avoid the dangers that await you. You're given no instructions but to collect bananas around the factory.

name: Avo Escape Space
description: Avo Escape Space is a dystopian, story-driven escape the room style VR game set in outer space! Assisted by Avo, the spaceship's AI system, you embark on a journey to escape your doomed vessel. To do so, you must engage your mind with a series of intricate and mind-bending puzzles!

name: Ashes of Sombtir
description: Ashes of Sombtir, the rpg where you follow the rules.

name: Ammossum
description: Dive into this action roguelite as a brave Possum, shooting down crowds of crazy beasts. Drink cactus booze, ride your train through the deserts, and feel the thrill of bloody shootouts! Whistling bullets, explosions, flying arrows, mines, fire, and acid — bring this chaos under control!

name: Naruto To Boruto: Shinobi Stricker - Master Character Training Pack: Boruto Uzumaki (Karma Progression)
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Boruto Uzumaki (Karma Progression) as a master in this Master Character Training Pack!

name: Truck Simulator Collection
description:
Here's the biggest truck collection you've been waiting for!
Hop behind the wheel, choose a mission and deliver your client's cargo on time!

name: The Smurfs: Learn and Play
description: Discover the world and learn by playing with Smurfs!

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories
description: Hop into the wonderful world of Smurfs and check what stories are waiting for you!

name: MechanixMind: IQ Puzzle Adventure
description: Dive into a world where physics reigns and every level offers endless possibilities.

name: Adventure Word: Around the World
description: World Trip using English words! Solve unique and thrilling English word puzzles operated with your fingers and adventure on hundreds of stages around the world!

name: Burning Secrets: A Bara Visual Novel
description: Embark on a journey to rescue an old wizard friend in bara visual novel Burning Secrets! Mixing high fantasy adventure with gay romance themes, Burning Secrets lets you choose between multiple routes as you journey through lush and inspiring landscapes. See the lighthearted narrative to its end while developing relationships and unlock steamy CG scenes along the way.

name: Cooking Arena: 9 in 1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Urban Flow: X-Mas Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Wingspan + European Expansion + Oceania Expansion
description:
This bundle includes:
WINGSPAN
WINGSPAN: European Expansion
WINGSPAN: Oceania Expansion

name: Wingspan + European Expansion + Oceania Expansion + Seasonal Decorative Pack
description:
This bundle includes:
WINGSPAN
WINGSPAN: European Expansion
WINGSPAN: Oceania Expansion
Seasonal Decorative Pack

name: The Dark Eye Bundle
description: This bundle contains three games set in the famous tabletop fantasy universe of "The Dark Eye". Dive into the universe's lore, uncover dark machinations, solve puzzles and test your skills in turn-based combat across three classic games from Daedalic Entertainment.

name: Tokyo Ghoul: Break the Chains
description:
The timing of the special move and the combination of characters are the key to victory or defeat! Strategic factors such as the order of skill execution and the timing of activation of special moves can also change the situation of the battle!

It features a plot “tangled between humans and ghouls”, a dungeon system that can be enjoyed by a single player, a co-battle system that allows you to fight side by side with other players , real-time PVP battles, etc. It's full of playable content!

name: Smash Balls
description:
Test your aim and timing in this fun and fast game

Take out all of the red enemies without running out of ammo

Build up a frenzy to unleash hellfire on the enemies

Smash everything and watch it crumble away!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Super Furniture Pack
description: This content requires the base game My Time at Sandrock on Steam in order to play.

name: Rogue Glitch Ultra
description: A roguelite action platformer in a vibrant glitch-ridden world. Amass a huge arsenal from over 150 weapon options and face hordes of enemies and tough boss fights.

name: Doppelgänger
description: This is a short game that focuses on light, darkness, and sound. Please experience it in a dark, quiet place and with headphones or earphones on.

name: Outbreak: Co-Op Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Suspicious Person Information
description: A short horror game set in Japan. There are two possible endings.

name: Five Nights At Freddy's: Nightshift
description: The Gameplay Consists of a quick and smooth movement alongside responsive controls as well giving it some style in the game.

name: Cold Abyss
description: Cold Abyss is a relaxing and atmospheric exploration game where you repair internet cables on the bottom of the ocean. There are no enemies or other forms of danger down there. Just you. The perfect game to unwind after a long day.

name: Flicky
description: SG-1000 port of Flicky.

name: Flicky
description: Sin descripción

name: Flicky
description: Sin descripción

name: Quandino
description: Falling-blocks game for playdate

name: The Town Secrets
description: You're neighbor is suspicious! Go to his house and discover what he's doing.

name: Worm Odyssey
description: Sin descripción

name: LBreakout2
description: The successor to LBreakout offers you a new challenge in more than 50 levels with loads of new bonuses (goldshower, joker, explosive balls, bonus magnet ...), maluses (chaos, darkness, weak balls, malus magnet ...) and special bricks (growing bricks, explosive bricks, regenerative bricks ...). If you are hungry for more you can create your own levelsets with the integrated level editor. There is also an experimental two player mode (via LAN) available.

name: S. Cargo
description: A short adventure game, S. Cargo is about a little postsnail on her quest to find the disappearing belongings of the islanders. You'll meet several colorful other creatures and find a few secret around as you explore and solve a few puzzles. It can be found for download on the official website by Smidgen, as well as an open source version on GitHub.

name: Dmod
description: Dmod is fan mademobile port of GMod

name: Meeting Myself
description:
It is a 3D first-person puzzle game, in which, the player must deal with, some, "diseases" by overcoming cryptic levels and grasping the meaning of them.
Meeting myself is a game that wants to reach out and raise awareness about certain moments in life and give a boost to those who are in a difficult time.

name: Drawing with Nat: Dream Diary
description:
Drawing with Nat: Dream Diary is a Yume Nikki styled exploration game featuring Nat!
Explore various dream locations to collect "Inspiration" which can be used to create drawings and also collect "Forms" which can grant you different abilities and change Nat's appearance.

name: A Twisted Path To Renown
description:
A Twisted Path To Renown: is a Multiplayer, loot-focused, PvEvP extraction shooter, set in the rugged 1899 United States!
Strap on your holster, assemble a posse, and get ready for a rootin'-tooting good time!
Roam the savage lands of the United States during the 1890s and live out your Western dream!
Fight against vicious bandits, or become one yourself as you loot and pillage from the Hills of Tennessee to the Pine forests of Arizona. Fight various factions in an unforgiving land for fame, and fortune!
Stay alert for ferocious wild boars, and bandits who will tan your hide for a chance to steal your precious loot!
Evade the resourceful and cunning Indigenous Peoples of early America to fight another day or attack against all odds for your chance at Legend!

name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Minas Morgul
description: The Lord of the Rings Online: Minas Morgul is the seventh expansion. It raised the game's level cap from 120 to 130 and added the Morgul Vale and dead city of Minas Morgul as well as seven new group instances and a new raid set in Shelob's lair. The expansion also introduced the seventh playable race of Stout-Axe Dwarves, whom players who pre-ordered it could access prior to the release date.

name: The Lord of the Rings Online: War of Three Peaks
description: The Lord of the Rings Online: War of Three Peaks is the eighth expansion for the MMORPG The Lord of the Rings Online. Announced as a "mini-expansion pack", it is smaller than other expansions in both scope and price, comparable to 2009's Siege of Mirkwood. Unlike all previous expansions, it did not raise the game's level cap. Instead, a new type of quests called "Missions" was introduced, which scale to the player character's level, allowing players across all levels to participate.

name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Fate of Gundabad
description: The Lord of the Rings Online: Fate of Gundabad is the ninth expansion for the MMORPG The Lord of the Rings Online. It is a direct sequel to the previous year's War of Three Peaks expansion and concludes the storyline that has been developing over several updates. The expansion raised the level cap to 140, added the region of Gundabad, a new Brawler class and brought a major change to the Legendary Item system introduced in the Mines of Moria.

name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Before the Shadow
description: The Lord of the Rings Online: Before the Shadow is the tenth expansion for the MMORPG The Lord of the Rings Online. It did not raise the game's level cap or advance the current storyline, but instead added a new starting zone for the new player experience, with a storyline set prior to that of the Shadows of Angmar.

name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Corsairs of Umbar
description: The Lord of the Rings Online: Corsairs of Umbar is the eleventh expansion for the MMORPG The Lord of the Rings Online. Corsairs of Umbar introduces the new innovative New Mariner Class, a fearless swordfighter with a unique balance system. Players can unleash powerful skill sequences in their swordplay to create powerful skill chains that leave their enemies in a daze and allies in awe. Slash through foes with slick swordplay, belt out rousing sea-shanties, and pull off crafty moves that will have enemies spinning in confusion.

name: Chikn Nuggit Nightmare Fwiends
description: You're now dreaming of your worst nightmare, that Chikn Nuggit and his fwiends are gonna kill you! You have to collect all the 10 Chicken Nuggets and then get out of this maze!

name: Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3
description: A remaster of Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3 (Legend of the River King GB), more specifically the Game Boy Color version, called Legend of the River King GBC in North America. It was released inside the Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3 & 4 bundle.

name: Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 4
description: A remaster of Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 4 (Legend of the River King 2) released inside the Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3 & 4 bundle.

name: AirKano: Dr. M no Yabou
description: A Mega Man-like game released by Keio Digital Vertex, featuring characters from the Kanon and AIR visual novels.

name: Null Gravity Labyrinth
description:
Find the golden cube to exit this abstract labyrinth.
When touching a spinning cube all elements with the same color will disappear and new paths will form.
When you touch a portal it will teleport you to another portal of the same color.

name: Extreme Skyway Racer Simulator
description: Get ready for a thrilling 3D gaming experience that will push your skills to the edge! Extreme Skyway Racer Simulator puts you in the driver's seat as you navigate precarious platforms suspended in the sky. Your mission: to race across these dizzying heights while maintaining your balance and avoiding a nerve-wracking plunge.

name: Domino: The Little One
description: Domino, an hand-drawn 2D adventure game, invites you to traverse a realm where the perils of global warming and ecological catastrophe manifest as monstrous entities, and the only weapon at your disposal is your wit and will to make a change.

name: Flowereverie
description: Flowereverie is a peaceful flower-laden puzzle game where, to perform any action you must first spell it, by arranging letters like flowers in a vase. Cast spells, spell spells, become the land's most prolific flower arranger, and you might be able to discover the dark secrets of the town proper.

name: Vespera
description: Vespera is an online co-op game. Play as relic hunters, solving enigmatic mysteries and escaping a terrifying monster. Will you dare to face the darkness to find the cursed relics?

name: Idle Progress
description: Idle Progress - A free idle game where your task is to produce as many resources as possible, improve your weapons and armor for good attacks, create good fishing rods for a good catch and get legendary items by completing legendary quests.

name: Doomer Farm
description: Doomer Farm - is a farm simulator set in a doomer post-punk atmosphere. Manage the farm, build factories, and avoid health inspectors.

name: Deep Sleep
description: A horror game about infinite dreams, where you need to constantly find abnormal places in the room to stay awake, otherwise you will fall into terrifying dreams

name: Criminal Behavior
description: Use your thinking and analytical abilities to solve crimes scenes. There is a burglar on the loose, and he is breaking into all types of buildings in order to steal expensive items. We need you to find clues and piece together a cohesive picture of each crime scene.

name: Kryh Explorer
description: Explore the world of the crystal-mining creatures, the Kryh, Meet other alien races, improve your equipments and customize your burrow. Great adventures are waiting in Kryh Explorer!

name: Hidden World 8 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Bwudaling: Da Fight for da Bwudahood
description: The game nobody wanted but everyone needed. The evil Twent has attacked, bringing his minions with him, as well as hundreds of saws to block your path. Dodge, duck, dip, dive, and dodge to prove your love for Bwuda as you track Twent down to his evil lair, and finish him once and for all.

name: Baphomet
description: Baphomet is an Action RPG that immerses you in sumptuous settings. As a knight, you are sent by the King to face an evil threat. With a sword and some magic powers, face your enemies and deliver the world from the the evil that is spreading.

name: The Unvisited Grandma
description: How long have you been visiting your grandmother?

name: Invasion: Tales of Tower Defense
description: Can you defeat an enemy that learns from you? Invasion it's a strategy game in which the enemy learns from you and implements changes to the attacks so they can win the upcoming war. During this journey, you have to unlock different towers and upgrade them to stop the invasion

name: Magic Architect: Into Disaster
description: "Embark on a journey to master your magical build! Will you choose 3-Way, Spread, or Rapid Fire? This is a one-man army shooter! Cultivate your magic, sell it off, and rake in the profits! You can choose your character and the magic you want to grow. Get rich in the blink of an eye!"

name: Mages Arena
description: Mages Arena is a mix of Pinball, Foosball and Air Hockey with a bit of strategy in the middle.

name: Statera: Aurum
description: In a time of peace and prosperity, life thrived on the island of Miralis and the port city of the same name. The island, known for its flourishing gold veins and fertile soil, gained fame through trade and the eager gold seekers who flocked to the mines to find their fortune.

name: Gravity Lab
description: Change gravity, change life and change the world. Explore the mysterious Gravity Lab, solve puzzles, and find out the truth.

name: Skul: The Hero Slayer - Mythology Pack
description: A mythical skull has descended upon Harmonia! This is the first DLC of Skul: The Hero Slayer, a story about a special little skeleton, Skul, who fights humans to save the captured demon king.

name: Omurice Next Time
description: Finn and Gray have been together for five years now. Two men, simple living, and their biggest hobby is just eating for fun. Explore their husband & husband life, joy and love, hopes and dreams, and casual awkwardness and embarrassment in this slice of life interactive storybook.

name: Wonderland
description: Dive into fear in Wonderland, a first-person horror game where you navigate an abandoned mansion, solving puzzles and uncovering mysteries. Face chilling challenges, explore haunted rooms, and decipher the mansion's dark secrets. Can you survive the terror and unveil the truth?

name: Simple Stock Trading Simulator
description: Dive into the world of day trading with 'Simple Stock Trading Simulator.' Easy-to-play, yet challenging. Test your skills, reach goals, and experience the thrill!

name: Hexceed: Glacialis Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Glacialis Puzzle your way through 206 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Blood Lily Loop
description: Your bestie seems to be hiding something. There's something about your world that seems odd as well, like it has...secrets. Dive into the time loop of this horror game and witness a "friendship" that rewrites the world.

name: Mysterious legend
description: This is a very adventurous exploration game.

name: Cards of Clotho
description: Cards of Clotho is a roguelite autobattler where you summon legendary heroes and conquer mythical realms! Weave your strategy and hold the Fates of Gods in your hands!

name: Devilish Blind Date
description: This game is heavily inspired by『Vampire Survivors』 You are summoned into an Isekai and fighting monsters with a mysterious girl, Nanako.

name: Neon Fuga
description: The spaceship pulls into a kaleidoscope of bizarre and dangerous worlds full of aggressive creatures. Will it be possible to break through the waves of enemies, and return back to the familiar space?

name: Hedra
description: Hedra is an early access, Unreal Engine 5-powered sandbox focused on geometric play and a community-driven design experiment. Manipulate a world through diverse modes like survival and puzzles. Your actions and feedback not only shape the world but also its ongoing development.

name: Sir Bob: Squire for Hire
description: In the legends of King Arthur... nobles, soldiers, and the Lady of the Lake all say you're too wimpy to become a Knight. Prove them wrong!

name: Dark Lord
description: Unleash your power in Dark Lord, a roguelike RPG filled with strategy, adventure, and sardonic wit. Rule your growing realm with an iron fist, fortify the stronghold, and avoid getting stabbed in the back by your advisors!

name: Legend of Egypt: Jewels of the Gods
description: Thabit mercilessly rules his kingdom in the land of Egypt, until one day he is struck by a heavy blow of fate. The gods Isis and Osiris take pity on the young pharaoh: by building a magnificent city that offers shelter to many contented inhabitants, Thabit can change his fate.

name: Crisis Survivors
description: A casual game of meat pigeons Dealing different damage to enemies through different skill combinations.

name: Timeshift Detective
description: Don the trenchcoat of private eye Harrison Steel and dive deep into a futuristic crime-noir story sprawling with clues to track down. Crime and corruption run rampant in the city and above all looms the mysterious phenomenon known as "Timeshifts". Can you rise to the challenge and crack the case?

name: MoeMoni Land
description: In"MoeMoni Land",you can see the cub forms of 21 well-known monsters,such as the big dog,the wine swallowing boy,and the white faced fox.They possess unique skills but each has their own devils.You and your friends can play the role of a demon cub and stage a brain burning social reasoning drama.

name: Chrono Bullet
description: Co-op bullet hell. Chrono Bullet is unique game with a choice of character class. A beautiful and colourful picture in an atmospheric world. Help the heroes to save their world by defeating unusual bosses.

name: Tank Captain
description: Tank Captain "is a strategic warfare game where players will play the role of commander and engage in different tank combinations to enhance the refined attributes of tanks and artillery. They can enhance their attack or armor abilities according to their preferences and win the war.

name: Towerbloom
description: Embark on a quirky roguelite tower defense odyssey where your cursor is the true hero. Hover over towers to supercharge their capabilities, unlock upgrades, channel powerful abilities, and gather resources to amplify your destructive prowess.

name: RunBunRunBun
description: RunBunRunBun is an Action Survival Rougelite Bullet Hell. Face off bosses and swarms of computer viruses using a vast arsenal of weapons and abilities. Select upgrades to create a build that can wipe out enemies in an instant.

name: Nexus Defenders
description: Tower Defense meets a Visual Novel narrative. Place an arsenal of towers to halt the invading enemy. Use special abilities such as napalm strikes, EMP blasts, and orbital lasers. A sci-fi space drama, filled with dialogue choices.

name: Cureocity
description: “People think battles need powerful weapons, but strategy at hand is key."The story follows a rookie adventurer and a new healer in a dungeon quest, with the core gameplay involving hand-picked methods using weapons and items. Fight or purify? Heal or alter? The choice is in your hands.

name: Reptile Chronicles
description: "Reptile Chronicles" immerses players in a vivid 3D fantasy PVP arena where they wield powerful magic, from fireballs to laser beams, battling opponents in real-time multiplayer duels. Dive into the realm of reptiles and prove your dominance!

name: 40 Seconds
description: A hidden object puzzle game inspired by public health issues related to suicide.

name: Survival Fantasy
description: SURVIVAL FANTASY, the most frenetic survival/waves action roguelike with platforms! Annihilate hundreds of monsters with your bow or your sword, collect items to enhance your abilities and demonstrate your skills on a huge map full of enemies with one purpose: kill you.

name: Heroes Wanted
description: 'Heroes Wanted' is a Roguelike Deckbuilding game that follows a unique set of rules. Build your perfect deck, gather Artifacts, and strategically take down your enemies using elements and multipliers!

name: Danny's Descent
description: Pedal through the looping halls to find Room 237 - Hand tracking VR horror game

name: Unreal Mashup
description: Unreal Mashup will test your gaming ability with a solid 3rd person shooter base experience. Fight against bots or join your friends in their personal server automatically created at every login. This high pace futuristic shooter is Fast!

name: Sona-Nyl of the Violet Shadows Refrain
description: The 5th entry in Liarsoft's Steampunk visual novel series is a mysterious fairytale in which fantasy and reality intertwine. The story unfolds from the perspectives of 2 women: one who travels in the ruins of Engine City New York, and one who finds herself in an underground wolrd with a violet sky.

name: Worker Simulator
description: "Worker Simulator" is an open-world video game where you play as Jack, a newcomer to Land No. 6. The game offers the freedom to explore the island, work in factories, trade with other players, earn money, buy or rent a dream home, and raise animals from young to fully-grown adults.

name: Estate Empire
description: Estate Empire is a multiplayer strategic game inspired by classic board games. Compete against your friends and develop your own strategy to win, and try to dismantle your friend's empire. Invest in the same street as your friends, use your cards or become the mayor to create new laws against them.

name: Project TB
description: Project TB, a 4v4 & 5v5 team battle action game based on a future where Earth becomes a relic of its past. With a top-view style, conquer your foes and control with acceleration and deceleration mechanics. Too late to stop. Experience speedy battles in a wide array of environments of this universe.

name: Oh Darling! I Hate To Tell You This...
description: Little Darling makes a wish at the place where all the wishes come true. Then her journey begins. She has to fight against the monsters with the power of light.

name: LetMeOut
description: Bundy is a scholar with a long history. You witness deep within him his research to cure his wife's dementia. The research involves extracting all electrical signals from neurons in living people, and you may also be a victim.

name: Raven Simulator
description: Isn't that too complex living as a human being? Then live your life as a raven and enjoy as you can!

name: On the Axis
description: Discover the simplicity and relaxation within On The Axis. An easy and calm puzzle game focused on mirrors and tiles.

name: Grav1ty
description: Discover an enigmatic universe. Explore diverse biomes, face ancient guardians, and uncover hidden secrets in this captivating 2D pixel art platformer. Embark on an unforgettable cosmic odyssey!

name: Cerebral Clash
description: Cerebral Clash is a multiplayer arcade shooter where you take control of a tank powered by an enigmatic sentient brain. Play solo in an intriguing campaign or battle online with friends and foes in thrilling warfare matches!

name: Train Valley 2: Community Edition
description: Drive forward the industrial revolution in this train tycoon micro-management game!

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: For a Vast Future: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza Bar Tycoon: GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Chicken Attack Deluxe
description: She's back! The crazy chicken from "Chicken's Revenge" is back on the warpath with vengeance. Defending her chicks in this "Magic Ball" style game, this mama bird won't put up with any fowl play when she's defending her brood. Non-stop action will put your reflexes to the test as you battle to save the little chicks! Prove your skills as you team up with our heroic hen to defeat a world of crazy guys and evil beasts!

name: 1 Penguin 100 Cases
description: After being caught in a fishing net, Pengoo is taken to New Zealand. Journey with him as he struggles to find his way back home. Surprises are in store as Pengoo befriends a colorful cast of characters and mystical creatures, each with their own predicaments. Can you help solve their problems as well as Pengoo's? 1 Penguin 100 Cases features 90 levels of classical I-spy adventure with original puzzles and mini-games for everyone!

name: Merc Storia: Ijutsushi to Kane no Neiro
description: Sin descripción

name: Fighter Street II
description: A PICO-8 demake of Street Fighter II.

name: Hareraiser: Finale
description: Sin descripción

name: The Devil's Imago
description: A tale of primeval forces, unknown, uncaring, and unearthed.

name: Excuse Me Sir
description:
Excuse Me Sir is a point-and-click adventure game featuring content creator Molly Moon. Her world is creepy, surreal, and if you're not careful... deadly! Can you solve the mystery of your missing brother? Or will Molly lure you to your doom?

"This game only has one rule: I Always Win."

Excuse Me Sir is an unholy collaboration between Molly, Airdorf Games, Jesse Cox (Scary Game Squad, Monster Prom) and Torple Dook (Chip's Tips, Hand of Doom). ALSO featuring original artwork by Siren Head creator Trevor Henderson!

name: Breath of Fire
description: An enhanced port for the Game Boy Advance handheld system with new save features and minor graphical enhancements, with the English version being released in Europe for the first time.

name: Breath of Fire II
description:
Breath of Fire II is a role playing game. The majority of game is played from a top-down map, however battles are seen from an isometric view. Ryu will form parties from among 8 other characters, each with their own set of skills and powers that will help him discover the truth behind the mystery.

In the GBA version, you can use a link-cable to link to friends and exchange weapons and items to defeat the higher evils. And with the inclusion of the community system, you can build and maintain your own city while you are fed up of exploring.

name: Pico Fox
description: Fly your Arwing to victory in this PICO-8 demake of Star Fox. Features 3 levels: Cornerea, Venom and Fortuna.

name: Dave.exe
description: Dave.EXE is a third-person low-poly stealth horror game loosely based off of the video game "Dead by Daylight", which the creator has a love-hate relationship with. You play as Dave Microwave, an everyman trying to live his life, until one day being pulled into warfare by the Berrys against Edgy Dave. You'll travel through timelines and collect soda from five machines while avoiding whichever of Edgy Dave's ranks is hunting you that round.

name: Flicky
description: Sin descripción

name: Flicky
description: Sin descripción

name: Flicky
description: Sin descripción

name: Dinosaur Island Escape
description: Explore an uncharted island filled with prehistoric predators that see you as nothing more than a free meal. Solve mysteries, uncover secrets, and explore this open world in a unique way.

name: Super Ocho Bros.
description: Super Ocho Bros. is a level hack for Super Mario Bros. 3 developed and released by Hansel2066 in November 2023.

name: Paperhead
description:
PAPERHEAD is a fast-paced FPS game set in a world where everything is made out of cardboard and paper but is infested with horror!
Use a pencil as a weapon and explore what exactly went wrong in the secret research facility and why suddenly papercut people were able to...bleed.
Paperhead's Main Features

- Cardboard cute style with a horror twist. Cute but horrifying!

- Brutal and fast-paced combat. Slide to throw enemies in the air, kick explosive barrels into them (or enemies themselves!), and jump onto them Mario-style.

- Use a Pencil as a weapon. Draw a bomb to explode enemies!

- Use a Pencil as a reality-warping puzzle-solving tool. Not sure how to get through? Try to draw a door on the wall!

WHY WOULD PAPER...BLEED?

name: Mega Man 4: Ridley X Hack 13
description: Mega Man 4: Ridley X Hack 13 is a Mega Man 4 rom hack by Ridley X with completely different levels, all based around the level design of Mega Man 2.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Fire Keeper Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Dark Souls civilization with its Leader Firekeeper.
Playing as her gives you:

- Unique district (Firelink Shrine)
- Unique unite (Undead & Mimic)
- Unique city projects (Weapon Schematics)
- Changes how religion is spread for everyone on the match (Soul Gathering)
- And much more!

name: Bellatrix e o Palácio do Tempo
description: Bellatrix e o Palácio do Tempo is an educational adventure game that tells the story of the beginnings of the telephone in a fun and interactive way.

name: Atari Flashback X
description:
The Atari Flashback X was released in 2019 and attempts to capitalize on the mini console trend, started by releases like the NES Classic Edition and Sega Genesis Mini, by being a near perfect physical replica of an Atari 2600 in miniature form. Like the previous releases, it was built by AtGames.

The basic model includes two wired controllers and 110 games. The deluxe model includes 10 additional games. A firmware update through the AtGames website allows both models to download more games.

name: Gam3rAbduction
description: A Game Made by Gam3rBoy57. Its about a Controller which gets chased by UFOs that try to abduct it.

name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Episode I: False Awakening
description:
The first episode of Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate, a sci-fi investigation VR game that continues the Chronos Universe series by developer MyDearest.

In Episode I, you play as Special Supervisor Hal Scion, tasked with unraveling the mystery threatening to plunge the city into disaster. As a "variant human" who has the unique ability to both see into and alter the past, your unique skills are exactly what is needed now.

There'll be menacing forces that will test your mental agility. Hide, Run, Sneak and escape from danger as you gather evidence. Then accuse the perpetrators in exciting courtroom sequences where you must prove their culpability even when they’re fighting you every step of the way.

name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Episode II: The Eleventh Hour
description:
Only four days remain until the city meets its fate. Do you have what it takes to stave off oblivion?

Episode II brings unexpected twists to the game's lauded narrative, providing answers and posing questions in this gripping prelude to the third and final act.

name: Pen Pals
description: Things are going HAYwire down at the farm! Corral a herd of particularly round barnyard friends back into the pen. When two matching animals bump into each other, you'll find an even larger animal in their place. Things get crowded quickly, so do your best in Pen Pals!

name: Scherzo
description:
Short RPG Maker game about choices and what happens when you make them, like many other RPG Maker games.

There are 5 unique endings and 4 variations of the same ending, making 9 total. (No secrets)

Although there is hardly any sound, Scherzo is best experienced with headphones for a very specific reason.

name: A Story of Paradise Lost
description: A demon convinces an angel to help rid her of her enemies and create a perfect world.

name: Channel 3
description: Tobias is bored at home, watching TV. Though he's about to have a very unique day...

name: Sex Drive
description: From the sickos behind Minotaur Hotel and Killigan's Treasure comes Sex Drive, a collection of gay interactive erotica about truckers. Prepare yourself for encounters with sweaty hitchhikers, fun times in truck stops, threesomes with hardworking men, long trips wearing nothing but briefs and all other kinds of trucker-related shenanigans.

name: Minna no Oekakiya-san
description: A drawing game, developed and published by Taito.

name: The Rake: Rust Dead Survival
description:
After you successfully defeated Jeff The Killer
and Slender Man,
you are ready for your next mission!
Hunt down and kill The Rake.
Find 8 Rake Voodoo dolls.
Lock and load! Revenge is MY NAME!

Find 8 Voodoo Dolls and Kill The Rake.
Good Luck!

name: Nexus Code
description: A suspense adventure visual novel.

name: Le Sanglot des Cigales: Tomes 1 et 2
description: An officially licensed French release of the first two chapters of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Le Sanglot des Cigales R: Tomes 5 et 6
description: An officially licensed French release of the first two chapters of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Utility Vehicle Simulator
description: Utility Vehicle Simulator (German: "Sonderfahrzeug-Simulator 2012") is a simulation that lets you complete communal or private assignments. Repairing street lights, cleaning sewers, grooming trees or cordoning off construction sites. 15 missions and a lot of vehicles are included and can be controlled by you. Maintenance as well as financial management are also your responsibilities.

name: Clowned Pro
description:
Pro version of the game 'Clowned'. Similar to the first one, you have to collect 8 papers to win the game, but this time you must avoid the 8 fake papers which are scattered around the map. Every time you collect a fake paper, the clown rushes at you.

Each time you collect a paper, the monster respawns back to the original position but gets a little angrier. The more papers you collect, the angrier he becomes. The key to complete the game is speed - collect the papers as fast as you can and avoid the monster.

TIP: There is a faint path on the floor. Follow this to find the papers.

name: Cursed Zombie Portals 666
description: Are you ready to survive as a warrior with lost 666 cursed portals, fight zombies, find portals and get out of curse? There are many weapons and ammo in the game for your survival. All you need in this game is good courage and finding portals by exploring dilapidated buildings. remember that portals may not always open to the correct dimensions. If you want to explore new worlds, download this game now and let the world talk about your heroism.

name: Generation Zero: Advanced Intelligence Cosmetics Pack
description: They say if you know your enemy well, you learn to wear his skin. As Resistance, you understand nothing better than the machines you fight day in, day out. That makes these new weapon skins, themed after the different FNIX machine classes, a fitting reward for your survival.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 2
description: A sequel to the original Taiko no Tatsujin Arcade game, featuring 13 new songs and new difficulty settings.

name: Waccha PriMagi! Studio
description: Waccha PriMagi! Studio is a Japanese rhythm-based amusement arcade game, it's the successor of the Waccha PriMagi! arcade game.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 3
description: A sequel to Taiko no Tatsujin 2, featuring 19 new songs, the iconic Balloon notes, and a Battle Mode.

name: Polarvoid
description: It's nighttime and you are home alone during a rainstorm. You get bored and decide to organize your family's photo album. There are 9 polaroids missing, you go look for them. Though you feel like someone is watching you from outside the house...

name: Skibidi Toilet India
description: You have to eliminate an army of walking toilets. To accomplish this task, you will have access to a variety of weapons. Additionally, there is a titan boss in the game who is the leader of the toilet army, and you must defeat him to win the game. So, get ready with your weapons!

name: Indian Vice City: Heroes
description: Become a superhero and explore an open world, help people, defeat enemies, and do whatever you want as a superhero. You can choose to be a hero or a villain, it's your choice.

name: Tetyis
description: A Tetris demake for PICO-8 that adheres to the 2009 Tetris guidelines.

name: Digimon Pendulum Ver.20th
description: Digimon Pendulum Ver.20th is the remake of the original Digimon Pendulum Virtual Pet for the 20th Anniversary of the device. It contains all of the previous Digimon from the Pendulum generation Digimon Virtual Pet line but not all are obtainable in one device.

name: Sunset Riders
description: Sunset Riders port for home consoles.

name: Street Fighter II
description: A J2ME port of Street Fighter II.

name: Classic Sonic Bundle
description: Classic Sonic Bundle is a game bundle for the PlayStation 3. The bundle features the first 2 games from the Sonic series.

name: Slashes
description: Just a casual talk between a girl and a knife.

name: Mahou Sensei Negima! Kagai Jugyou: Otome no Dokidoki Beachside
description: This extracurricular lesson from Negima universe takes place in a paradise resort and is a side-story from Negima series based on the manga with the same title.

name: Negima!? Chou Mahora Taisen Chuu: Checkiin Zenin Shuugou! Yappari Onsen Kichaimashitaa
description: A Nintendo DS game based on the anime series Negima

name: Negima!? Dream Tactic Yumemiru Otome Princess
description: A turn-based strategy game based on the Negima anime & manga series.

name: Minecraft: The World Warrior
description: Master the Hadouken and conquer the dark Hadou with this Capcom approved skin pack! Select your character from 35 classic world warriors and fighters like Ryu, Ken, Chun Li, and more.

name: The Amazing Digital Funkin'
description: The Amazing Digital Funkin' is a parody Friday Night Funkin' mod based around The Amazing Digital Circus. In the mod, Boyfriend goes against Pomni and Jax.

name: Point Click Killer
description: You've been driving all day and can barely keep your eyes open, when you finally see the lights to a Motel. Maybe they will have a vacancy? Maybe you will get more than you bargained for...

name: Cyberpunk 2088
description:
Flying cars in cyberpunk madness await you.

If you want to walk down the street in the city of the future in a world full of flying cars in a true Cyberpunk frenzy, you are in the right place. While the charge of your vehicle is decreasing in the flying car mode, collect the charging items in the flowing traffic and let the vehicle continue its journey. But be careful, because the cars fly, there may be cars flying all over the place, be careful not to hit them and collect the highest score. Don't forget to check out the entertainment venues in the city of the future. Have fun...

name: Year 2088
description:
Are you ready to experience the peak of the cyberpunk age in 2088?

In 2088, when mankind was at the height of the cyberpunk age, there was a great war and destruction in the world. The earth turned into a radiation barren desert, and some of the survivors settled in virtual worlds on outer space. See people trying to live with the limited technology taken from the world. With the Year 2088 game, you can experience a real cyberpunk life in the orbit of the moon, one of the biggest of these space tops.

name: Abyss Boat
description: Sin descripción

name: Zarathustra: Cybergeddon
description:
Zarathustra - Cybergeddon is a classic point and click adventure with inventory and dialog puzzles in a scifi futuristic setting.
It's a rather casual experience with no dead-ends or overly difficult puzzles.

"In the aftermath of The Inflection, a momentous event that unveiled cosmic truths and alien technology, two religious factions emerge: the Church of Flesh, embracing chaos and free will, and the Church of Neon, upholding order and stability.

Amy, an FBI agent affiliated with the Church of Neon, carries with her a unique asset: a cybernetic implant housing the consciousness of a past individual—you, the player.

Together, you navigate the complexities of a case involving a book stolen from the Church of Flesh. This investigation is set against the backdrop of a world grappling with the implications of its newfound enlightenment and the delicate balance between these two divergent philosophies."

name: ReVolte
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape from the Nuke
description: Can you survive the Atomic bomb by traveling through parallel universes through portals as the world is destroyed by nuclear bombs? There are only seconds before the nuclear bombs explode. Can you find the portal doors before the bombs explode in maps and unmarked parallel universes? Since all vehicles have different strategic features, you should choose the vehicle you will use very well. In addition, enemy cars will try to prevent you from passing through the portals by causing you to crash. Also, since portals often change places, you should make a good escape plan every time you start the game. Also, realistic car damage and accident physics have been added to the game.

name: Crescent Satsujin Jiken: Reporter Saotome Kyouko
description: Sin descripción

name: Crescent Satsujin Jiken: Tozasareta Nikki
description: Sin descripción

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Final Fantasy XVI Pack
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: Square Meal
description: Eat and spit blocks, monsters and food in this co-op dungeon adventure.

name: Cave Chaos 2
description: Escape the caves in our second installment of the Cave Chaos series!

name: Do Us Part
description:
Do Us Part is a short puzzle adventure game where the player controls the newlywed Margerita in exploring the estate of her new, somehow very rich, husband. Of course, a normal, peaceful marriage would not make an exciting fairy tale or game, so things do not go as expected. People might've gone missing in this mansion before. Spooky things might happen. Someone might die. Who knows! Margerita doesn't, otherwise surely she wouldn't be in this position in the first place.

The game is loosely based upon How the Devil Married Three Sisters, with an emphasis on loosely.

name: Sweet
description: In Sweet, you play as Pike, a little animal who just wants to go home after work! Explore a collection of odd and dreamlike environments as you head to where you need to be. Encounter strange creatures and become friends with them during combat!

name: Cold and Unforgiving
description: A submission to Ludum Dare 54, Cold and Unforgiving follows four young adults as they venture through the wilds of northern Michigan in search of a rumored ghost town. However, when it starts to get dark, they're left to make a decision that will change their lives forever.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game: Generations
description: Pokemon TCG Generations is a ROM Hack of the original Pokemon Trading Card Game, where the cards, attacks, attributes, resistances, weaknesses, and various effects have been extensively altered and expanded. This ROM Hack introduces Pokemon from nearly all generations of the franchise, offering a fresh and exciting take on the traditional card game experience.

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game: Kanto
description: The game is an overhaul of Pokemon Trading Card Game for the GBC to match Pokemon Red/Blue.

name: Digimon Adventure Trading Card Game
description:
Pokemon TCG but with Digimon.

All Pokemon swapped out for Digimon, all attacks shuffled and reworked for improved balance, less coin flips for increased strategizing, evolution cards buffed to be worth the investment, all types balanced; every type has exactly 2 weaknesses and 2 resistances, Fighting and Psychic replaced with new "Earth" and "Dark" types, respectively and minor dialogue tweaks

name: The Backrooms Exploration
description: You were an employer of M.E.G and you were assigned to go on an adventure into the Backrooms, but something went wrong and you were completely lost. Deep into a various liminal spaces with a realistics graphics created with Unreal Engine 5

name: Air Aces
description: Take command of various modern jet fighters (F-16 Falcon, Eurofighter Typhoon, Dassault Rafale) and copters (Bell AH-1 Cobra, Eurocopter EC665 Tiger) in this perfect mix between a realistic flight simulator and a mission based air combat game.

name: Horizon Midnight: Aircraft
description: Sin descripción

name: Jet Ski Mania: Aquatic Adrenaline Rush
description: Dive into Adrenaline: Ride the Waves of Victory!

name: Ziggy Zaggy
description: Switch the sides to go further in the world.

name: The Forgotten Tribe
description: The Forgotten Tribe is a small arcade game with 9 levels to go through and get your fellow tribesmen back. Use a map to navigate the dungeon and successfully collect all of your tribe to unlock a happy ending!

name: Danjigoku
description: Danjigoku is a retro-styled classic arcade twin-stick shoot 'em up game. Shoot through hordes of aliens and collect 7 different kinds of upgrades to survive as long as possible!

name: OnlyUp!
description: Have a fun and remember, the path in this game is only up.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series Project Nosferatu
description: A fast-paced Action RPG with a fully customizable arsenal combo battle system.

name: Train Traffic Manager
description: All Aboard the Chaos & Strategy Express!

name: Keep The Fire: Survival Simulator
