description: Fuel Your Destiny: Ignite the Game Within!

name: Inertia 2
description: Inertia 2 is a first-person action platformer with free-run and old school FPS inspired movement mechanics.

name: Draw and Go!
description: Draw and create players to defeat the enemy team!

name: Draw and Color
description: Draw, paint, choose your painting tools, and progress with Draw and Color!

name: Social Dev Story
description:
A simulator where you develop your very own dream game. Can you make a game that reaches a billion downloads?! Jump on the social game craze!
Easy-to-play social app developing company game. Band together your team of great staff and bring them to the top of their game!

Develop groundbreaking games and become #1 in the industry!
Manage a game development/management company and create an amazing game special to you! Train up staff and think up new project ideas all while racing against tight deadlines to become the game maker that everyone knows and loves.

name: Resident Evil RPG
description:
Resident Evil RPG is a fangame based on the original Resident Evil (the one released for PlayStation, Saturn and PC), which also includes certain elements from Resident Evil Rebirth (Gamecube).

Resident Evil RPG was developed in RPG Maker XP by Evilbiel and co-produced by Dungeon Master and follows the story of a police team, S.T.A.R.S, who go to investigate a sinister mansion where there have been macabre reports of murders.

The game has extra unlockable modes with new adventures (some fake), with a storyline behind the main one! The project came from the idea of playing Resident Evil from a new perspective, in 2D, but far surpassing Resident Evil Gaiden, from the Game Boy Color!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Vault Edition
description:
The Vault Edition includes:

- Cross Gen Bundle of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
- Available in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Call of Duty: Warzone:
-- Soap Operator Pack*
-- Zombie Ghost Operator Skin*
-- Soul Harvester Tracer Weapon Blueprint*
- Nemesis Operator Pack
- 2 Weapon Vaults**
- BlackCell (1 Season) + 30 additional Tier Skips***

name: Extraordinary: Immortal
description: "Extraordinary: Immortal" tells a story of a 700-year time loop. Karena suddenly receives a mysterious letter, in which the sender informs her that there is one thing she must complete on her own, or else all the efforts to save the world from three years ago will become entirely meaningless...

name: Early-blooming Black Lily: Hana to Itsuki no Naisho no Hanashi 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Yuan Ka Card 2: MetaCard2
description: Hello everyone, this is my second game "Yuan Ka Card 2". Based on the rich card entries of the first generation, it innovatively incorporates the concept of projectiles. Through the strategic combination of cards and projectile targeting, the control of movement is replaced.

name: Quest Town Saga
description:
A dark shadow was cast on a certain peaceful little town... Well, no, actually it was just a bunch of silly-looking monsters suddenly causing trouble. Anyway, someone's got to teach them a lesson, and that's you!

Help out the townsfolk and they'll let you take charge of their town, building it as you like. Plus, you get to be a respected hero. Some get their treasure from quests. Some get items and money from managing a town. But why not both?!

Create a party of characters with different Classes, like Knight or Beast Tamer. Have pet monsters fight alongside. Choose your weapons and armor based on the elemental affinity of your foes to hit hard while taking less damage yourself.

You can do it all in style, as there are lots of outfits for you to choose. And if you think looking human is boring, no problem! Wear a dragon, cat, dog, or fox costume. No one's going to judge you! Show off your cool character at the Online Plaza, and maybe even quest together with another player.

Embark on an epic yet laid-back adventure in this town-building RPG. It's fun whether your priority is to save the world or get a stylish hat.

name: Wave Dungeon
description: Wave Danjon is a roguelike RPG in which the player is forced to navigate a map that switches at regular intervals. Conquer dungeons that become more powerful and evil with each wave!

name: Winter of the Arbyen
description: 'Winter of the Arbyen' is a game that combines adventure and store manage simulation. In the world where the Ice Age has come, you must survive as a shopkeeper in a coal mine village. Find the missing father, chase the 'Firestone'. Various characters are waiting to help you or take advantage of you.

name: Zombie Night
description: Zombie Night is a twin-stick shooter where you explore various locations to gather resources and build up your base to defend the night against the zombie horde.

name: The Source
description: The Source is a unique modern take on the Text Adventure genre. An outsider to a foreign world, you must choose a kingdom to help gain an ancient power locked deep beneath a mysterious Well. Explore each kingdom, solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery surrounding this shattered world.

name: Tower of Hidden Waifus
description: Discover desire in Tower of Hidden Waifus, a unique hidden object game. Ascend the tower, find over 600 enticing waifus, and unlock sensual encounters with animated passion. Explore secrets, master challenges, and unveil your deepest desires.

name: Touhou Meijinka: Song of Divine Tempest
description: A thunderous concert appears...

name: The Tau Experiment
description: The Tau Experiment is an episodic RPG Adventure game where you play as Sam, an employee with the Tau Corporation. Choose your own adventure as you work to help Sam put an end to the company's plans.

name: The Void Project
description: The Void Project is a fast paced arena shooter that throws you into an arena simulation. Face different kind of demons, overcome their patterns and finish them off in as less time as possible to reach the top of the leaderboard and make yourself worthy of calling ~The Void Breaker~.

name: Titan Station: VR
description: Experience Titan Station in VR.

name: To The Tavern
description: Send Patrons out to quests. Use the class and element triangles to deal critical damage! Serve ale to give your patrons to give them buffs and equip them with the best weapons. Don't let your patrons die or your business will close.

name: TunsTan
description: A cartoon style side-scroller action/strategy RPG. Raise a warband of tumbleweeds to lead into battle and command and fight alongside them. Explore the world, craft items, and lead your warband to the adventure!

name: Two Hands Eggs
description: Two Hands Egg is an emotional egg with two hands...that is, you who play this game. Have fun cooperating with your friends, competing against each other.

name: Watson
description: Watson is a two-player co-op horror adventure game. The two cute little robots must escape from the evil beings chasing them. Explore a grand and beautiful Victorian city with a steampunk makeover. Uncover secrets about the city, the robots, and the beings chasing them. But don't get caught!

name: Wacky Escape
description: Stop trippin' and escape your destiny in this runner action game

name: Vagrient
description: Play as Vagrient in this sci-fi action/adventure game full of exploration, combat, character progression and puzzle solving!

name: Undergod
description: Take over heaven in this airborne-combat roguelike where you fight hordes of angels while growing stronger every minute.

name: Universal Power
description: Universal power is a fantasy RPG game designed and published by Martia Nouri Namini.

name: The Perplexing Orb: Bounce N' Roll
description: The Perplexing Orb returns in a brand new entry packed with new features! New art style, new levels, and new game play mechanics! Bounce N' Roll through this all new adventure!

name: The Game Of Death
description: Step into the bony shoes of Death in this unique platform game. As the iconic skeleton character, you're one day away from retirement when a sinister thief steals your life savings. Reclaim what's yours and set off on your dream vacation.

name: The Maze Contract
description: The Maze Contract is a single player retro action game with vector-style graphics. It takes a lot of inspiration from the 1980's shoot-em-up arcade games, but with added tactical elements and lots of upgrades for your ship and weapons.

name: Survivor Challenge TD
description: Survivor Challenge TD plunges you into an epic struggle for survival against an oncoming horde of monsters. Arm yourself with the most formidable and thrilling weapon combinations and abilities as you brace for an ultimate showdown against a powerful boss!

name: Synthetic Soul
description: Synthetic Soul is an immersive modern Rags to Riches life sim with an in-depth robot companion. What kind of person will you become once you truly have it all? Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.

name: Teacher Seduction
description: Math is such a boring thing... Unless you have a hot teacher! In this case, even her angry boyfriend might not be a big problem.

name: The Backrooms: You've Been Here Before
description: You find yourself in Backrooms, and it's up to you to find a way out of this place. You are completely lost, in a world of endless corridors and liminal spaces. And no one knows what's waiting for you around the next corner.

name: Tales of Moriviha: Deadly Secret
description: A survival horror first person RPG with branching storylines and rich lore, where your dialogue choices can come back to haunt you. Use your wits to survive, put your sneaking skills to the test, and when all else fails, it's up to you to decide if your resources are worth the fight or not.

name: Super Laura Up
description: Super Laura Up is a platformer Inspired by retro platformers and precision platformers, this game will take you on a journey through a variety of challenging levels, where you must use your precision and timing to overcome obstacles and reach the end.

name: Super Elastic
description: The girl said that this game is really flexible, come and play together.

name: Suika Shapes
description: Match a variety of colorful shapes in this addicting match two puzzle game in an ever-enclosing space

name: Suika Dish More Plates
description: More plates, more points. More fruits, more points.

name: Strexy Slayers
description: Create your hero and enter into battle either alone or with friends in a dynamic action slasher with elements of roguelike and base building.

name: Smoking Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to relax and have a good smoke in an atmospheric village? Then you are exactly at the right place - take a drag on your cigarette and go ahead and explore our wonderful world.

name: Sorcevival
description: Sorcerers have nearly succumbed to corruption. In Sorcevival, a horde survivor roguelite, it's time to turn the tide. Choose wisely how to empower your magic spells as you face nightmarish creatures. How far will you go in this battle for survival?

name: SOS Zombie: Survival
description: SOS Zombie follows the harrowing journey of a group of diverse survivors trapped in a city overrun by a zombie apocalypse. Seeking refuge in an abandoned house, the group fights waves of increasingly aggressive zombies while preparing for a rescue helicopter scheduled for evacuation a rescue point.

name: Sovereign Reign
description: Gifted with divine will, establish your Deity's kingdom on Earth. Recruit believers, erect essential structures and vanquish barbarian threats to shape your realms destiny and Reign as Sovereign.

name: Spooky Spins Returns: Crazy Cash Edition - Slots
description: Spooky Spins Returns : Crazy Cash Edition is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Horror theme oriented from left to right. - with the similar lightning strike feature.

name: Space Miner: Idle Adventures
description: A casual idle asteroid mining game where you fly around mining and make the numbers go UP! A dash of humor, RPG, science and more.

name: Shopping in a Winter Zombieland
description: An apocalyptic Visual Novel from Zombie Zone Germany for Christmas with German voice acting, lots of decisions and six different endings. There is only a version in German language.

name: Seven Little Spider Kittens
description: It's a lovely day to lose your children, so go find your seven little spider kittens and bring them home in this relaxing hybrid VR platformer/shooter/eater

name: Serve The Cups
description: Make the coffees and serve the cups. Get ready for a chaotic, couch-party experience in Serve The Cups! with mini-games designed for up to four players, you'll brew and serve your way to success. It's the perfect game for coffee lovers and gamers alike!

name: Sae
description: SAE takes you to a dreamlike yet perilous tropical island chain in the South Pacific. Survive the natural perils, gather resources, and find your way back to civilization.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Thanksgiving Throwdown
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Thanksgiving themed table for the season of harvest.

name: Rose Bullet
description: Rose Bullet is a Retro, Comic Style, Horror RPG! Play as a vampire hunter on his way to kill the count and avenge his lost lover.

name: Robots at Midnight
description: Robots at Midnight will have you embracing intense combat, unravelling deep lore, and discovering what it means to be human. In this Action RPG, explore the world of Yob as Zoe, a scrappy hero searching for her past and protecting her future.

name: Rhythm League Heroes
description: Join the musical heroes and enjoy an adventure filled with humor and music! Follow a group of charismatic characters to face diverse enemies through musical battles. Manage your team to advance in the story and discover the different corners of the mysterious Sky Island.

name: Really Dog
description: You see a dog. It pees the sea. You smash it! This is a refreshing small single player game.

name: NBody
description: Place asteroids and planets and send them orbiting into targets in a physics-based puzzle game where everything attracts everything.

name: Obscurum
description: Are you afraid of the sea and other waters? Overcome your fear of the dark and deep water in this simulator. No one will stand by your side on the open sea. Go into the water and try to survive.

name: OnCall
description: On Call is a visual novel that takes you through a 3-day rotation at Merritt General Hospital. Build trust with your patients and their families to get them on the road to recovery. Manage your own stress while confronting these challenges or you may just crack under the pressure.

name: Our Life on Water
description: Start your new life as Rivertalker in this magical life-sim RPG. Befriend spirits of the Mekong River to build and protect your floating village. Drift, farm, fish, forge friendships, fall in love. Shape the tale of a world worth saving.

name: Paranormal Capture Investigation
description: Become a paranormal investigator in Paranormal Capture Investigation! Play with your friends and discover the world of the paranormal. The game is developed on Unreal Engine 5 with the latest technology.

name: PathoBlasta VS
description: The EXUOA Virus was found in a remote location in central USA by professor Zed. He founded BLASTA Corp. and put together an elite Unit of Bio Soldiers to deal with areas of infestation. You as a member of Blasta must protect the containment and quarantine areas and not allow the virus through.

name: Pizza Delivery: Zebaxx
description: You are a young Spanish woman who has just moved to the outskirts of Venice, and has just found a job in a newly opened pizzeria...

name: Plowing
description: Plowing is a point and click simulation game, where you have to subdue the whole town in 13 days to establish order. Shoot. Imprison. Pardon. Hear the visitors out. Keep track of time. But most importantly — keep calm…

name: Psionic Sentry: Infinite
description: "Psionice Sentry: Infinite" is a third-person beautiful girl action shooting and tower defense game. A gameplay focused on combat and skill selection

name: Qwess
description: Qwess is a online MMO survival game set in a Alien like world with a unique game style and design, take control of various creatures and roam around the world, fight and survive among other players and truly make your story unique as you traverse the alien landscape through out your adventure

name: Eye of Nollyn
description: A detective game in which you play as the private eye of Nollyn, the fictional city where money is what counts and what rules. Bribe people for additional clues, solve cases, and experience the captivating story with unexpected plot twists.

name: Kosmos: The Discovery of Nature
description: Kosmos is a first-person exploration adventure in which you set sail on the vast ocean to discover the wilderness of nature. Make use of the natural resources of the tropical jungle and meet a variety of wildlife on your journey of taking photographs of the wonders of the world.

name: Fairune: Fragment Isles
description: Where did all the fairies go? Fairune: Fragment Isles is an action-adventure game where you follow Liana through her journey solving mysteries and puzzles from island to island.

name: Khuga Bash!
description: Take control of Kuro, the fearless brawler who's on a mission to prove their combat prowess in the mysterious PAW Labs. In Khuga Bash, it's not just about luck; it's about proving you're the ultimate champion of the Khugaverse!

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Law of Salvage
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary Tool: Captain Laffite (Legendary Hunter), Scuttled Glory (Legendary Winfield 1887 Terminus), Knuckle Shunt (Legendary Scottfield Model 3 Brawler), Hagfish Bronze (Legendary Choke Bomb)

name: A Park Full of Cats
description: Welcome to 'A Park Full of Cats,' a hidden object game that invites you to revel in the enchanting world of amusement parks! Experience the thrill and excitement of the rides and give those cats the fun they truly deserve!

name: Damsels in Distress
description: Damsels in Distress is an interactive adventure. You will play as a lustful paladin who’d have to choose between sex and duty all the time. All this is accompanied by awesome sex animations and Japanese voice-over.

name: Happy Wonderland Solitaire
description: Enjoy the popular card game with 150 different solitaire variants and a beautiful winter ambiance! The game includes solitaire variants such as Freecell, Fan, Four Seasons, Klondike, Spider, Bakers Dozen, Canfield, Golf, Sir Tommy and many more.

name: Kill The Shadow
description: Kill The Shadows is a suspenseful plot-oriented mystery-solving investigation game. It uses a time loop as the background of the story. It has many characters and branches, and high-definition 3D scenes and 2D pixel characters create a highly contrasting and unique visual effect. Art style.

name: All About The High Score
description: All About The High Score is all about the high score. That's it! You chase high scores. You try to get a number up. Numbers must go up.

name: Minami Lane
description: Welcome to Minami Lane! Make yourself a cozy little street where people hang out and enjoy their time. Add and customize buildings, manage your shops and watch life unfold in your tiny neighborhood.

name: Gateway to the Kulikovo Field: The Battle of Yepifan
description: Find yourself in the center of a decisive battle for Russian lands. You are a 16th century Sagittarius. Repel the Crimean army, show valor and ingenuity in battle. Whether the enemy reaches Moscow or not depends on you!

name: Dinosaur World
description: Dinosaur World is a survival game about dinosaurs. You can tame and hunt dinosaurs, ride them, grow crops, craft a variety of weapons, build houses and furniture.

name: Icarus: Industrial Furniture Pack
description: Decorate your base with our Industrial furniture pack. Featuring a range of new furniture and decorations to bring an industrial aesthetic to the base of your dreams. Support our continued development and add some functional styling to your home.

name: Coffee Brakes
description: Battle your friends in an office chair joust to the death! Only one of you can be employee of the month, so battle your friends in a variety of game modes and levels. Get on your office chairs and take your Coffee Brake! Coffee Brakes is a 3rd year project developed at Media Design School

name: Age of Advent
description: Welcome to the Age of Advent! Play four minigames based on the members of Hololive -Advent-! Save the Moai with Bijou, make a soup with Nerissa, try not to crash with FuwaMoco, and avoid the gaze of Shiori!

name: Boba Bar: Bubble Tea Tycoon
description: Boba Bar: Bubble Tea Tycoon is a Kawaii themed pixel art game where you start your journey with a humble drink stand. Learn new recipes and unlock new equipment and locations, manage sales prices and inventory in order to succeed in becoming the largest bubble tea tycoon in town!

name: Forgery Craft
description: Master the art of forgery in this story-driven simulation game. Start with altering documents by changing single signatures and dates. End up forging entire art pieces that could fool any museum expert.

name: Dino Survivors
description: Face hordes of Dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures in this survival game with minimalist gameplay! Dino Survivors is a casual game with Roguelite elements, where you need to be faster and survive several species of extinct animals. Your choices will determine this.

name: Mighty Mini Golf
description: Mighty Mini Golf is a wild mini golf adventure! Golf through crazy hazards using wild items in both single and local multiplayer modes. Fight and block hazards with swings of your club, fight dangerous bosses in single player mode, and explore map screens and unlock new characters and courses!

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: BMW DLC
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - DLC includes 5 licensed BMW cars: - 1974 BMW 2002 Turbo (E10T) - 1979 BMW M1 Procar (E26) - 1988 BMW 635 CSi (E24) - 2002 BMW M3 (E46) - 2016 BMW M4 GTS Special Edition (F82) - R4 M31 - R6 M88 - R6 M30 - R6 S54 - R6 S55

name: Deathrun
description: Deathrun is an electrifying online multiplayer sprint where speed, strategy, and survival go hand-in-hand. Team up or go solo in a race through a treacherous obstacle course where every player is for themselves. Dodge traps, outpace the competition, and don’t trust anyone.

name: CyberRush
description: Dive into CyberRush, an adrenaline-fueled blend of Subway Surfer and NFS. Race through procedurally generated Cyberpunk levels, evading police, blasting obstacles, and competing for highscores. Experience the rush of neon-lit streets in this fast-paced infinite runner

name: Karakuri Colosseum
description: Karakuri Colosseum is a captivating VR sword-fighting experience, set in a Japan-inspired rendition of the ancient Roman Colosseum, where players engage in intense duels against samurai robots with Japanese swords.

name: Garbageman
description: In this retro-style arcade game, help Frank to keep the columns of the Clock Building free of trash to prevent its imminent collapse.

name: Hume Index
description: As a special agent who specializes in dealing with unstable reality, you need to use your firearms, blades, and elemental reactions to eliminate mutants in an abandoned cosmo, control the source, and escape if possible. Can be played as a single player or with 2-4 players in Co-Op mode.

name: Locked
description: Locked in a deadly cat-and-mouse with a relentless serial killer, you must outsmart, escape, and survive in this intense 2D horror experience. Solve chilling puzzles, and stay one step ahead of a relentless pursuer. Inspired by PS1-PS2 classics and iconic horror films.

name: Chaperone
description: Chaperone is a first-person psychological horror game. The events are completely real. Supernatural events taking place in an atmospheric and constricting closed house, events of unknown cause. You can enjoy being scared to the fullest.

name: Chinese Culinary Shop
description: Chinese Culinary Shop "is a traditional Chinese food simulation cooking game. In the game, players can play the role of a talented Chinese food chef, experiencing the production process of traditional Chinese cuisine firsthand, gradually transforming your small inn into a renowned food paradise.

name: Monica's Paradox
description: Monica's Paradox is a narrative driven puzzle platformer. Play as Monica, a downtrodden QA tester who gets sucked into her company's big new release, navigating bugs with the aid of your sometimes helpful, often hostile workmates, all the while coping with office gossip and romance.

name: Metal Breaker
description: A fast-paced, adult side scrolling shooter inspired by classic shoot-em-up games.

name: Diamond Dash: Plaid Peril
description: Dive into Diamond Dash: Plaid Peril, a unique rolling ball game for Perspectacles 3D glasses. Conquer the perilous plaid path, collect diamonds, and leap between tracks. Challenge levels and global competition await. Experience gaming in a visually stunning world.

name: Lymbus
description: Descend into a digital labyrinth of our own making. Move around with your keys. Do everything else with your cards. Exercise maximum strategy in building your deck, then throw it out the window in screen-shaking, bullet hell-style battles. Combat happens in real time, meaning every moment matters.

name: Hypnofantasis
description: Hypnofantasis is a game in the genre of classic Run'N'Gun games, in a mysterious aesthetic similar to the dream world. The protagonist is a masked gentleman who kills demons with saber blows and a barrage of bullets and projectiles.

name: Bumper Ball Bash
description: Big ball impact, brothers, come and impact me, and then you can get me.

name: 6N23
description: 6n23 is a action-platfomer-racing game. Rush fast as you can. Use your finger, find path. It has controls similar to a fighting game, allowing you to practice your control skills.

name: Icarus: Art Deco Furniture Pack
description: Decorate your base with our Art Deco furniture pack. Featuring a range of new furniture and decorations to bring an art deco aesthetic to the base of your dreams. Support our continued development and add some style to your home.

name: Coloring Pixels: Onion Pack
description: This layered book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Like an onion, this book has layers! Each image is a part of a greater whole!

name: Ale & Tale Tavern
description: Get ready for a thrilling mix of genres: a cooperative, first-person, open-world fantasy tavern simulator, action, fishing, hunting, exploration, and completing fun and diverse quests. And, of course, cooking! Play with friends, feed and quench the thirst of the entire world!

name: A Park Full of Cats: Haunted Ride
description: Prepare to be thrilled and chilled on "A Park Full of Cats: Haunted Ride",' the eerie downloadable content for 'A Park Full of Cats.' Embark on a ghostly adventure through six haunting scenarios! Are you brave enough to face the Haunted Ride?

name: Knight in the Maze
description: This is a story-driven Roguelike game. Four knights, while investigating anomalies within the labyrinth, accidentally became trapped inside a sealed maze. They need to work together to navigate the labyrinth, discover the cause of the anomalies, and simultaneously find a way to escape.

name: Lampy
description: Lampy is a captivating puzzle-platformer where you guide the adorable cube, Lampy, through a world shrouded in darkness. Use Lampy warm glow to light up the path, solve challenging puzzles, and uncover the heartfelt story of his quest to find his way home.

name: Bleed Runner
description: Bleed Runner is a 2.5D cyberpunk beat-em-up in which a lone knight fights an encroaching plague! Suddenly stricken with the disease, seek the cure on the mysterious spaceship and survive by grabbing, throwing, and pummeling enemies for blood.

name: Don't Shout Together
description: If you utter a sound, you and your team are doomed. Keep your cool for 30 minutes to flee this ominous forest by contacting the Rescue Crew.

name: I am a Fish Online
description: This is a multiplayer online RPG simulation survival game. You can chat casually, socialize and make friends, collect adventures, and obtain various achievements. Become a hero from a small fish. Fight bosses together. Keep your hunger, happiness, sleep, and unlock more fish. Like character, thanks.

name: Bubble Ball!
description: Combine balls of the same type to create bigger balls and earn as many points as possible without filling up the container in this cheery, casual puzzle game! And if you dare use the Ball Launcher, beware of bouncing balls to the stratosphere...

name: Maza
description: The protagonist does not want to lose his home because of the ambitions of his sister and her cynical husband! Oleg Mazapov wants to get the required amount of money to solve his housing problem, but it turns into unexpected consequences...

name: Circle of Swords
description: Circle of Swords is a party-based retro RPG by a solo developer. Gather your party, conquer deadly foes, discover powerful artifacts, and survive to tell the tale! Inspired by classics like Baldur's Gate and Neverwinter Nights.

name: In Style
description: Immerse yourself in a relentless third-person shooter set in a dystopian cyberpunk world.

name: Haunted House
description: "Cheong Wing Mansion" A plot game set in a public housing estate, Prosperous Mansions is an exploration of Hong Kong in the olden days, with elements of ghosts and urban legends. The game is divided into units, each of which has its own story, yet is closely intertwined.

name: Battlechat
description: As a content creator you will be able to interact with your followers through this game. Let them compete against each other while you direct the game or be another player.

name: Electoral Dynasty
description: A political-simulation watch-the-clock strategy game. Pass laws, executive orders, and deal with events, all while maintaining the balance of your nation's most important attributes. Will you manage to keep your coalition together or establish a dictatorship? Only you can decide, Prime Minister.

name: Idiots' Fantasy
description: Idiot's Fantasy is an idiotic hack-slash Roguelike in a world where every rule can be changed by equipping various rule books. Fight, explore, buy, switch, and die as you conquer this randomly generated world using the idiotic gameplay you've created yourself.

name: Factories of Golden Waters
description: Factories of Golden Waters is a strategy game where you manage a shipping empire. Build docks, deliver materials, and produce gold from water. Optimize your supply chain and thrive in a barren land.

name: Archive 1985
description: Charlie and his childhood friend Jack go on a boat trip that turns into a nightmare. Trapped in a storm...Charlie washes up on an abandoned fishing island...

name: Mad Jyacer
description: Bring healthy food to the finish line. Help your family lose weight!

name: Magical Monstergirls Academy
description: Unlock over 80 fully animated and voiced scenes, battle 35 unique monstergirls as male or female in this magic themed RPG. Needs only one hand to play.

name: Brawlygon
description: A stylized, low poly fighting game, with various warriors from various eras and worlds! Simple controls make it easy to learn, with plenty of tools to play around with for those who want more depth! Also introducing “Piercing” attacks, to shake up the genre, by dealing higher damage on blocking opponents compared landing a clean hit!

name: Pico Sim Date 2
description: Pico Sim Date 2 is a point-and-click Flash game co-created by Moosh and Acromatik for Pico Day, and released on May 1, 2007. It is the second entry in the Pico Sim Date series and acts as the direct sequel to Pico Sim Date. This time, Pico has to save the kidnapped Nene from the psychotic Cyclops, through dating four girls who have information on his whereabouts.

name: Dagger Run: Aerocombatic Racing
description: Dagger Run: Aerocombatic Racing is a Sci-Fi immersive-sim and racing hybrid. Race futuristic jet racecraft through tracks across multiple planets. Step out of the cockpit to explore the racing world, find, purchase, tweak and modify new parts and ships.

name: Error_Boy.exe
description: The games have mixed up due to an error! Defeat the enemies by using items from various games! 1000101 1101110 1101010 1101111 1111001 100001

name: Battlecade
description: Welcome to Battlecade, A fast-paced frantic arena shooter pitting you and another opponent against eachother to see who comes out on top.

name: Ball Pit King 3D
description: Ball Pit King 3D is a fun and addictive puzzle game where you drop, stack and merge quirky 3D balls with hilarious faces to create the ultimate King Ball! Play and see if you can rule supreme over the Ball Pit!

name: CrimeSceneCleaners
description: The protagonist, who has taken a job as a special cleaner, goes to his first cleaning site with his seniors. Witnessing the scene of a gruesome death, he begins to feel something that he has never felt before. He begins to feel the presence of something he has never felt before.

name: Garmm Adventurer Vol.1
description: You play as a young man who lives in a faraway village full of elders and move out to become an adventurer in a bigger city to find some young women to have sex with. VN element with turn-base fighting and animated sex scenes.

name: Battle of BackYard
description: Engage in thrilling household air battles in this wacky game. Choose your role as a skilled pilot or a sharp-shooting gunner, and customize your aircraft to fit your preferred playstyle. Take on daring missions or challenge friends in multiplayer combat. Relive history and dominate the skies!

name: Complete
description: Complete is an online co-op survival game where we kill the robots that attack us.

name: Cassiel
description: Cassiel is a casual roguelite game where you fight against hordes of creatures. Combine unique items and weapons to become the strongest on a satisfying and wave based gameplay

name: Incarnation
description: A mouse-only reverse roguelike platformer. After each level, you must lose one of your celestial powers until you are completely transformed into a human. Will you be able to reach mortality?

name: Galactic Breakout
description: Return to the classic with Galactic Breakout! This space-themed Arkanoid game challenges players to destroy diverse blocks to conquer each level. Unleash the power of 10 unique upgrades while dodging 10 debuffs. Overcome 75 thoroughly created levels and achieve the max game score

name: Ash and Tor: Yuma's Quest
description: Explore the dungeons and try to find and save the Queen Yuma... but wait: it's almost an impossible dungeon. And why? Because it's easy to say: you must move two knights at once!!! Are you ready to find and save tons of girls without dying?

name: Micro Macro Farm
description: Micro macro farm is a small relaxing and cozy game about farming. Plant seeds, harvest them and create products. Make money and gain experience to unlock more seeds, buy machines and expand your garden.

name: Infected: Outpost
description: Gather resources, refuel the generator, and escape the facility before time runs out! But beware, the infected can steal the skins of their victims. Face your friends in a social deduction horror game like no other!

name: 2D Dogfight: World War II - Eastern Front and Pacific
description: "2D Dogfight - World War II (Eastern Front and Pacific)" DLC includes the following 35 Aircrafts: B-25J Mitchell F4F-4 Wildcat F6F-5 Hellcat F4U-1A Corsair F4U-1C Corsair F4U-4 Corsair SBD-3 Dauntless IL-2 1941 IL-2 1943 IL-10 LaGG-3 La-5FN La-7 MiG-3 P-39N-1 P-63C-1 Tu-2S Yak-1 Yak-3 Yak-9T

name: Big D Randy
description: Randy is not playing around.. Collect all candy's on huge map and don't get caught!

name: Kaisho
description: A Third person fantasy RPG in a fantasy medieval world, sword, katana, axe fighting system where you are a little girl named Hana in the kingdom of Kaisho. Fight against creatures and spiders to free Kaisho from the evil. Step into a fantasy adventure and start your journey. Welcome to Kaisho

name: Farming Simulator 22: Case IH Farmall Anniversary Pack
description: Celebrating the 100th Anniversary of Farmall, you get two iconic Farmall tractors by CaseIH, authentically digitized: The classic six-cylinder Case IH Farmall 1066 Hydro and the modern multi-talent Case IH Farmall 120C - both continuing the enduring Farmall legacy in Farming Simulator 22.

name: Leaf Blower Sim
description: Dive into leafy tranquility in Leaf Blower Paradise, a solo adventure where you wield a powerful blower to transform messy landscapes into clean havens. Upgrade your gear, enjoy the serene atmosphere, and sculpt your outdoor sanctum. It's a relaxing escape to blow away stress, one leaf at a time.

name: Call of Duty: Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Warrior Pack
description: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Warrior Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: 4Tacos
description: Help Mr. PG and Cleto the goose to protect the Divine Taco from the dinosaurs, in this game inspired by the beat em up of the 90s, use special powers, travel the streets of the distant nation Tacotitlan, know its folklore, its food and its secrets.

name: Gilgamesh II
description: Promising hours of broken crafting systems and unfinished, empty dungeon floors, GILGAMESH II is the right product for you this Holiday Season. It is a continuous work- a historical work, which will never be finished. It needs a manual, but does not have one.

name: Year 2088 Classic
description:
Are you ready for the cyberpunk craze of 2088? flying cars and robots.

Are you ready to see a real cyberpunk craze at the peak of the great pre-war technology in 2088? In Year 2088 Classic, you can drive flying cars and flying motorcycles, and fight invading AI robots. You can also see the entertainment venues in Dream City and Dark City and wander the streets of the future as a tourist. All it takes to experience all these great adventures is a mobile phone and download this app.

name: Deus Ex: Transcended
description: Built largely for first-time players, Deus Ex: Transcended is a mod focused solely around faithfulness to the original, while bringing an unmatched arsenal of bug fixes, paired with key notes of Quality of Life changes.

name: Mr. Mix
description:
Based on the infamous game described on the popular creepypasta of the same name.
Mr. Mix from Castilan Games  is a faithful recreation of the mysterious typing game for PC. On Mr. Mix from Castilan Games  you can either challenge the practically impossible original game mode or play the hacked game mode so you can reach the ominous level 6.

name: Strike Solitaire
description:
Solitaire or bowling? Two in one!
Complete 120 levels in Strike Solitaire in the unique setting of bowling hotels.

name: Resonance
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Resonance. Play interactive storylines to learn English in an inuitive style.

name: BoltBreak 2
description: Become the ultimate superhero in the first-ever open-world speedster game.

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms Season Pass
description: Embark on countless new adventures and set yourself up for the long term with the Vagrus Season Pass. With it, you can partake in Vagrus's massive expansion, as well as survive and thrive in numerous new, exciting locations across the Riven Realms and beyond.

name: Tamara In The Forsaken Dungeon
description: Tamara In The Forsaken Dungeon is a third-person adventure, dark atmospheric puzzle game

name: Syncromania
description: Syncromania is a modern side-scrolling hyper-action shoot-em-up game with platformer elements.

name: Suv 4x4 Car Parking Simulator
description: Perform realistic parking tasks with SUV vehicle, win prizes, customize your vehicle, and experience the excitement! Enjoy the game and go on an adventure!

name: Risk of Rain 2: Seekers of the Storm
description: A new storm gathers over Petrichor V and with it comes an ancient threat. Master new survivors and wield new items as you fight your way across uncharted regions of Petrichor V. Ascend the Colossus, defeat The False Son, and unlock the true power of his Soul.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 02
description: Drift in style with RIDE 5 - Free Pack 02!

name: Patrolling Mars
description: Drive over the rough Mars terrain, jump over holes and other obstacles, fire at attacking alien space craft and other dangers. Clear each stage and try to get the highest score. A good pallet cleanser with good old arcade fun.

name: Kugle
description: Play with your friends in a galaxy in which you collect, breed and trade Kugles.

name: Fortnite: Infinite Drift Pack
description: Combat is the name of the game for this team. Prepare your tactics with the Infinite Drift pack. Includes 3 Outfits, 3 Back Blings and 3 Pickaxes.

name: Expedition: Crushing Depth
description:
Expedition: Crushing Depth is an atmospheric submarine horror game.
Maintain and operate your submarine in order to reach the deepest point in the ocean, but watch out for dangers!

name: Dizzy Fight
description: Dizzy Fight is a fun dynamic fighting game with bright effects that you can play against the PC or with friends. Choose your character with his superpowers, and put the heat on all the enemies!

name: Electron Zaraftor
description: Sam is an artificial intelligence drone, programmed by Rebecca, designed and built by the US army. Connected to the army database, Sam start asking questions from the archive. And accessed the wrong file.

name: Ba Quartet X
description: Ba Quartet X (バカルテットX) is a fan-made Touhou Project Mega Man X series-like action-platformer game, featuring the bakartet: Cirno, Mystia Lorelei, Wriggle Nightbug, and Rumia. It was created by Penpenmushi no Koucha

name: Chicken vs. Eggs
description:
Aim and shoot game with an angry rooster in the main role.

Play the role of an angry bodybuilding rooster and collect all yolks from the super eggs to become an arm wrestling champion.

name: Crime Boss: Heavy Hitters Pack
description: Bring the pain with a new host of hard hitting weapons included in the Heavy Hitters Pack for Crime Boss: Rockay City.

name: Cooking Trip: New Challenge - Collector's Edition
description: Cooking trip is an exciting game about dishes and restaurant business!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Reserve Pass
description: Expand your fishing journey with the Reserve Pass!

name: Agatha Christie: Hercule Poirot The London Case - Deluxe
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The Game Original Soundtrack
- The Art of: Agatha Christie - Hercule Poirot: The London Case - HD Digital Artbook

name: The Ascent: CyberSec Pack
description: The CyberSec Pack is the new explosive collection from CyberSec Mega. With 2 new weapons, 1 new tactical, 4 new pieces of armor and 4 new animated weapon skins, you will have all you need to make a bang!

name: Builder Flipper Bundle
description: A bundle of House Flipper and Builder Simulator.

name: My Night Sun All Games
description:
A Bundle containing all My Night Sun Games games.
Includes: 3 Xbox games and 3 Windows games.

name: The Fast Journey
description:
In "The Fast Journey", embark on an exciting 2D adventure as a brave frog named Rafa.
Your beloved frog, Polly, is captured by malevolent creatures.

name: Tyalband
description: Enter the mountain of glass, Oronmaril! An incomplete traditional roguelike for the Playdate.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CD Doubledecker Pack No. 2
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features 8 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: CD Doubledecker Pack No. 2
description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features 8 versions of these cars with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CSD Bap 117 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CSD Bap 117 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CSD Bap 117 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!

description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised.
